Then, he happened to gaze toward the shoe. The old sneaker looked incredibly worn. The laces showed myriad frays and even the shoe's canvas walls exhibited dozens of minor imperfections. Josh imagined trying to climb the enormous structure, searching for one handhold after another in his valiant ascent.

Kevin, at the same time, looked down and enjoyed seeing how much his shoe dwarfed his shrunken friend. He could only imagine what Josh might be feeling.

"I think I'm ready for you to grow me back now," Josh shouted.

Kevin, however, stepped away and walked across the lab. Josh followed the titan's movements with definite fascination.

As the tiny man watched, Kevin picked up a...
1431111122121111122211.title: Shrunken Josh

choices: Josh gets defiant
Josh submits
14311111221211111222111.content:
Basically, Josh, a guy into extreme kind of sports, thought (for a while, at least) that being shrunk would be so cool. He imagined he would be able to have all this kind of fun in a giant and extreme world. Unfortunately, he didn't realize Kevin had his own ideas.

As he watched his friend take a huge glass beaker in hand, Josh began to feel his nerve fail him.

"Kevin, we should discuss this!" Josh shouted.

Kevin's enormous fingers closed the gap. "Kevin! Don't!"

••••••

Now that he has had some time to think this over, Josh regrets his haste in letting his friend shrink him.

After being transported to Kevin's apartment in the huge glass beaker, Josh found himself transferred into a colossal glass tank.

Before he could adjust to his new surroundings, Kevin mysteriously left him alone in the big glass tank on a small table about three feet off the floor.

"Wait! Where the hell are you going?" Josh shouted as Kevin walked toward the door. "Don't leave me here! Kevin!"

Left alone, he found his mind filled more with doubts about the wisdom in entrusting himself into Kevin's care.

The tank is bare for now. It's like being stranded inside a huge glass arena.

As Josh looks around the place, he remembers how Kevin keeps his apartment in a shabby state. He can see lots of clothes strewn on the floor. T-shirts, underwear and even a pair of his sneakers are dropped haphazardly on the floor.

Josh has been awake and alone for more than an hour. He didn't know where Kevin had gone.

Josh had been in Kevin's apartment several times in the past and always used to think that the place was small and cramped. Since the tank holding him is in the middle of the room, and the walls are glass, he spent some time looking out at the rest of the apartment. It's just a total disaster. Kevin has dirty clothes all over the floor, empty, or possibly not quite empty, pizza boxes tossed on tables and on the floor.

He can also see some discarded fast food cartons and empty soda and beer cans. He even saw a pair of Kevin's really ratty old sneakers near the door. Josh knew that Kevin always wears his sneakers till they fall apart, and they always smell pretty bad. Josh remembered how he and other friends used to kid Kevin about the smell. He can't imagine what they would smell like now!

"Man, I knew he was a slob, but from this perspective, he's a disaster!" Josh said aloud.

On and under the coffee table are old food containers from a bunch of fast food restaurants, along with empty beer and pop cans.

Whenever Josh tries to get a better look at anything he pushes into the glass, which only reminds him of just where he is and how small he is. A single aluminum can now resembles some huge industrial storage silo.

Stuff that Josh used to take for granted, now take on all different proportions. A simple beer can isn't just a beer can anymore — it's a massive structure that could probably hold everyone in his whole apartment building comfortably.

Josh feels the knowledge sink into his brain of how small he has become.

He know that without Kevin's assistance, he will never leave this huge apartment. For all practical purpose, his buddy's apartment is now his universe.

Judging from the thickness of the glass walls compared to his body, Josh decided he must only be about a quarter of an inch tall.

"There's no way I can get out of here on my own," Josh said aloud. "I don't have a chance."

Ironically, Kevin — the jerk, Josh thought — is probably the only chance he has of getting out of this mess. He can't believe how stupid he was to let Kevin of all people shrink him

"I guess my acting without thinking things through really got me this time!" Josh exclaimed as he paced the floor of the huge cage.


He has racing thoughts. Where is Kevin anyway? Why would he just drop me in here and leave? He seemed to interested in me shrinking and now has just left me?

Josh decided to be patient and tough it out. Kevin will grow him back eventually...hopefully.

Suddenly, from the far side of the apartment, you hear a loud noise.

A door the size of a mountain swings in to admit a titan. It's Kevin!


Kevin walked into his apartment, carrying a small brown paper bag in one hand. He tossed some keys into a bowl on a stand near the door and looked across the room toward the fish tank. It looks empty.


Josh remains paralyzed on his feet. There's a massive loud bang and another one. The tiny man felt vibrations in the floor of this tank.

Kevin is only walking from the door through the apartment! Josh can't believe how big his friend looks. It's so unreal! He could not even judge how big his friend must be! He tried, but he could not even focus on his whole body at the same time.

"Oh man, he's walking this way...." Josh whispered nervously when Kevin turned his attention toward the tank.

"There you are!"

"Where the hell did you think I'd be?" Josh wanted to ask.

The sound of his friend's voice sounded loud but distorted and boomed in his ears.

"Ahhh! Not so loud!" Josh screamed as Kevin's thunderous voice roared over him. He placed his hands to his ears to try to stop the ringing.

Kevin tapped on the glass pane at the front. "How's it going, little buddy?"

Josh gazed up at Kevin's giant face, way up above the top of the tank. His friend was smiling down at him.

Kevin moved his hand to the front of the tank, and hit it with a finger causing huge bangs. He laughed as his shrunken buddy got tossed on his butt from the vibrations!

"Well, how's everything going?" Kevin asked.

Josh stayed seated, not wanting to get bowled over again. He yelled as loudly as he could. "Kevin! What's going on? You said you'd make me bigger after just a little while!!!"

"Damn! I should have looked for a magnifying glass while I was at the lab." Kevin said with a grin as he stared through the glass pane. "I can barely see you!"

Josh covered his ears again as he felt pummelled by Kevin's loud voice.

"Kevin, you're too loud!" Josh tried to communicate to his giant friend.

Josh decided to stand on his two legs again. Unfortunately, standing did little to increase his height at all in comparison with Kevin's immense stature. Josh looked up at Kevin from below, and realized he looks so much different than anytime he had ever seen him all these years.

Kevin realized with pride and pleasure that he must look absolutely huge to his shrunken friend.

Josh gazed at Kevin as if he was some monumental tribute to the male form, but instead of being made of stone, Kevin remained very much flesh and blood. And every single move made by his giant friend is accomplished with stunning swiftness, leaving Josh to wonder how someone so huge can move so fast.

Josh could not quite figure out his motivation, but he kept staring at Kevin. The two guys have been friends for years, and they have even wrestled and done a lot of play fighting with each other.

With startling clarity, Josh recognized that they had never settled which of them was stronger than the other — a moot point now, Josh realized.

For some reason, Kevin seemed content at the moment just to stare at his tiny friend on the other side of the glass, making Josh feel nervous like he is no more than a test subject.

Kevin's huge eyes just keep looking over his buddy's tiny body. And there's nowhere at all for Josh to go.

"I can't get over how tiny you are," Kevin said.


Josh started waving his arms to see if he can communicate, "Kevin, can you hear me?"

To Josh, his voice sounds loud, but Kevin's head and ears seem so far from him!


Kevin dropped a paper bag into the tank. "Go ahead." I haven't even noticed your attempts at communication. "Look in the bag."

The bag, dropped in the middle of the tank, looks the size of an arena-sized brown tent.

Josh walked across the floor of the tank toward the bag, still occasionally looking up at Kevin's unreal mountainous form.

Josh entered the open bag and found all sorts of stuff inside at normal size. He needed about three seconds to realize the items are not normal size.

"He's shrunk this stuff to my size," Josh said aloud. "That's where he must have been all this time."

Josh found so many different items — a scuba tank and a weird backpack-shaped thing. After examining it, he realized it's a parachute!

He found an old skateboard he used to use a few years ago and realizes Kevin must have been in his apartment to get all these items.

He stepped outside the bag, "Kevin! What were you thinking, shrinking all this stuff?"

"I got to thinking..." Kevin said as he leaned over the top of the tank, now looking down inside at his buddy's tiny form. "...if you want to really get maximum benefit from shrinking, you'll need some fun supplies. So, I went back to the lab and borrowed Zac's brother's shrink ray again."

"He answered me!" Josh exclaimed in surprise. "He can hear me!"

But, his surprise is followed almost immediately by disappointment when he realizes Kevin is only telling him what he was going to say anyway.

Kevin didn't hear him after all!

"Wait, what did he say?" Josh said aloud. "Getting maximum benefit from shrinking? He's not serious!"

Josh looked up at Kevin's huge form again and yelled. "Kevin, come on, the joke's over! Take me back to the lab and grow me back! I'm not going to get mad at you! I swear. Just take me back!"

But, observing his giant friend, Josh realizes Kevin isn't even listening, although his grin is getting wider as he observes the tiny gear at his little friend's feet.

Josh stares at one of Kevin's massive hands rest at the top edge of the tank. "What do you wanna play with first, little guy? Pick out something."
14311111221211111222111.title: In Kevin's Charge

choices: Josh submits
Josh continues to be defiant
143111112212111112221111.content:
As scary as this situation was, Josh wasn't just going to let Kevin dominate him completely. "This is ludicrous, Kev!" he tried to yell up to his best friend. "C'mon now!"

But Kevin didn't answer, he just drummed his fingers on the top of the tank. Josh shook, but managed to stay up. He wasn't going to let Kevin push him around, just because he wasn't as large as he was. He wasn't a pet. He was a human being. He yelled a stream of swear words up into the sky, where Kevin proudly and arrogantly smiled down at Josh like a billboard. "Have you chosen yet?" he asked, smugly, not hearing a thing but getting the message from Josh hopping around in circles like...

Like a ticked-off insect, Kevin established. And that's exactly what he was, really. He resolved it was time to teach him that.

"Listen, Josh, buddy," he began.

Josh was hopeful at Kevin's tone of voice.

"Be reasonable. You're not going to get out of here, I'll be honest with you. Might as well make the best of it, right? I really don't want to have to hurt you."

Whether that was true or not, the gravity of the statement made Josh shiver.
143111112212111112221111.title: Futile

choices: Kevin drops the smelly socks on Josh
Kevin makes Josh climb on his feet
1431111122121111122211111.content:
Josh wanted to continue in a defiant spirit, but what more could he do? He realized, with utter dismay, that his quarter-of-an-inch stature severely limited his options.

"Time's a wasting, little buddy," Kevin bellowed.

Well, he spoke at an ordinary volume in his typically loud voice, but for teeny Josh, his friend's voice sounded thunderous.

Josh looked skyward and saw Kevin's titanic hand lowering toward him. Did the impatient giant mean to finish him off?

Josh tried to run, but his haste caused him to stumble, letting Kevin scoop him up quite easily.

Kevin carried Josh to the kitchen table and unfurled his colossal fingers. He saw his tiny friend curled in a speck-sized ball in the middle of his open palm.

As Josh recovered from his shock, he opened his eyes and saw Kevin's enormous face. The glittering dark eyes fastened on his insignificant body.

"What do you want?" Josh cried.

Kevin hadn't heard, but he did want something. He leaned back and pushed his chair away from the table. The grinding noise hurt his tiny friend's sensitive ears.

Kevin then raised his feet and propped them on the edge of the tabletop.

Josh stared in awe at the massive socked feet covered in yards and yards of cotton fabric. His friend's feet looked more than 300 feet tall and almost 140 feet wide. He saw the outline of massive toes beneath the socks.

And then...

He nearly coughed as he started choking. Kevin's feet smelled badly enough at normal size. Now, tiny Josh could not escape the intense odor.

Kevin watched Josh fall to his knees, spluttering and choking.

"What's the matter, little buddy?" Kevin asked. "Is it these?"

Kevin reached down and began to peel off one of his socks. As Josh watched, Kevin moved on to the other foot and peeled off the second sock.

He held both of the rank-smelling socks high above his shrunken friend.

Kevin enjoyed this. If Josh refused to think of something fun to do, he would make the decision for him.
1431111122121111122211111.title: At Little Buddy's Expense

choices: Kevin wants a homecooked meal
Kevin wants to go out for dinner
14311111221211111222111111.content:
"Could it be these, buddy?" he repeated. "The smell used to disgust you when you were normal-sized. You used to tease me about my pups. They're not a problem now, though, are they?"

Like a vending machine crane dropping a stuffed animal, Kevin simply let go of his socks. They landed like a tarp on Josh, cloaking him entirely. The thick fabric and doubel-weight instantly shoved him down towards the table. Josh coughed, strugging to catch his breath. The smell was repulsive. He was getting light-headed.

"You're going to be spending a lot more time with those," said Kevin nonchalantly. "You know the phrase about going a mile in another's shoes? Well...you're a marathon runner. I'm sure you can handle more than a mile."

Kevin picked up the socks, amused at the sight of Josh curled up under them like a little beetle. He could have crushed him under his thumb. As gently as he could, Kevin pinched Josh between his finger and thumb and dropped him into his sock. It was a 300 foot drop to the bottom, where Josh slammed into the toe of the sock. It was the most softest and most worn part of the sock.

"Listen Jo -- buddy," said Kevin, "I'm going to find us some grub. Until then, just take a nap, alright?"

Kevin stuffed the socks, along with Josh, into a tennis shoe that he removed from his foot. He removed the other and set them by the door.
14311111221211111222111111.title: Socking It To Him

choices: Josh ends up choosing...
Kevin makes the decision...
143111112212111112221112.content:
What did he want to play with first? The thought would have been laughable if it wasn't so frighteningly assumptious. The first thing he wanted was to get out of here! Or, more accurately, to be restored to his former size. Kevin simply couldn't realize how humiliating this is, Josh realized. Or, he suddenly thought, having an epiphany, maybe he does. And this is why he’s doing it.

He'd never been mean to Kevin. Sometimes, Josh admitted, he was a sore winner, but that was because he rarely lost. He enjoyed sports and especially winning. He loved rubbing it in his friends' faces that he was the most athletic and talented, but who didn't like to show off? However, he'd never meant to make Kevin feel inferior! As inferior as he felt now, dwarfed by Kevin's hand atop the jar. It was about a foot in height, but that was equal to 300 feet to Josh. The only way he ever would exit, he knew, was with Kevin's help.

And Kevin would be just happy to let his friend rely on him.

"Josh, you have a choice yet?" Kevin asked, letting Josh know with his tone that if he didn’t choose soon, he would choose for him. He began to tap his hands on the top of the tank. It was an impatient, insignificant gesture, but things could not have been more clear to Josh. The vibrations caused by Kevin's habit knocked Josh off his feet. When he tried to stand up again, to face the sky that had become Kevin's face, he fell again. What kind of message was Kevin trying to send? That he couldn't even stand without his permission?

He was scared. Scared of the power his irresponsible, and possibly vengeful, friend now had over him. Scared of the number of ways in which he could be hurt, purposefully or accidentally. Scared of remaining this size for the rest of his life. He had to appease Kevin, he knew. It would be the only way. Seeing all of his equipment in front of him, he couldn't figure out which he would feel safest using at this minuscule height.
143111112212111112221112.title: The Better of Two Evils

choices: Josh awakes in a cage
Josh awakes still in the test tube
14311111221211111222112.content:
Josh could only watch in curiosity as his friend picked up a small, clear test tube. For a minute, Josh wondered what Kevin planned on doing. This wasn't a time to play around with Zac's brother's science equipment. And then Kevin suddenly turned, Josh aware of how huge Kevin was. He was over 1800 feet tall, his mere shoe 120 feet high and over 300 feet long. And that's when Josh realized that he wasn't going to grow back to his former height soon or, he feared at all.

"Kevin!" He yelled up. "Kevin?!"

A sudden impact near Josh threw off his balance, and he fell hard onto the cold metal of the platform. He clutched his leg, which was bruised, and looked up...to an awe and fear inspiring sight. Kevin's ratty sneaker rose up like a skyscraper, showing off even minute details which used to be insignificant. Josh had a sudden moment, in the shadow of Kevin's footwear, in which he felt significant.

"WE'RE GOING TO ENJOY THIS, JOSH...OR AT LEAST, I AM." Kevin couldn't help but crack a huge grin at his tiny friend's predicament. And swiftly, he set the test tube on its side like a cave to Josh. And then with his fingertip, he nudged Josh gently in. To Josh, however, he was struck by a huge force. He flew not only through the opening but into the very end of the tunnel. He struck his head hard, and felt disoriented. The last thing he could remember before becoming unconscious was feeling like he was flying, transparent glass all around, and he rose into the air...and into the pocket of Kevin's jeans.
14311111221211111222112.title: Test Tube Josh

choices: Kevin puts Josh in his shoe
Taken in hand by Kevin
143111112212111112221121.content:
Josh awakened to find himself still held in a glass prison, although a much more roomy one.
For an instant, he fears Kevin has shrunk him to an even more tiny size. He then realizes he is no longer in the test tube but has been placed inside an empty glass fish tank.

Through the thick glass walls, he makes out items in Kevin’s apartment. They look familiar, but on a much larger scale.

Josh also remembers the short time when Kevin kept some tropical fish. He kept neglecting their care until they died, leaving him with an empty tank that, until today, served no purpose but to take up space in the cramped apartment.

“I’m so fucking stupid!” Josh exclaimed, shocked at how his puny voice is lost in the vast glass cage. The tiny man asks himself why he ever trusted Kevin.

The door to Kevin’s apartment opens without any warning and Josh looks fearfully at his friend’s huge body as Kevin enters the apartment.

“Kevin!” Josh shouts. “Get me the hell out of this cage.”

Kevin walked over and tapped on the front glass panel of the tank. “Awake now?” Kevin asks.

“Yeah, I’m awake. Get me out of this cage.”

“I went back to the lab,” Kevin said. “I got this great idea. If we’re going to have fun with your new size, I thought you might could use some gear your size. I have clothes, parachutes, mountain-climbing equipment... You name it, and I shrunk it!”

Kevin dropped a small package into the cage. “Go ahead. Look at everything I got for you.”

Josh ignored the shrunken crate. “I should have known you would pull this crap. As soon as you shrink me, you put me in a freakin’ cage!”

Kevin waited patiently. “Are you going to look at the stuff I brought you or not?”

Josh defiantly folded his tiny arms across his chest.

After going to all his extra trouble, Kevin feels justified in feeling angry at his ungrateful friend.

Kevin, looking down, frowned. “Well, maybe I need to teach you a lesson about who’s in charge...”
143111112212111112221121.title: Second Thoughts

choices: Follow Kevin's point of view...
Follow Josh's point of view...
1431111122121111122211211.content:
"I swear," Josh yelled at his titanic friend. "You're going to pay for this."

Kevin could only shake his head, chuckling. He found a chair in the corner of the room and he grabbed it, pulling it in front of the cage. And then he put his hand into the cage, reaching around for Josh. Josh seemed to immediately go into a state of panic, racing in circles to avoid Kevin's hand. Kevin allowed Josh to play the game for a couple of minutes, enjoying it himself. Once Kevin had sufficiently tired Josh out, he easily grabbed him between his thumb and index finger. He couldn't believe how weak and puny he was, the size of a grain of rice.

"Kevin!" Josh screamed, "You're hurting me, man! Stop this stupid game!"

"YOU AGREED THAT YOU WOULD SHRINK AND PLAY SOME GAMES, RIGHT JOSH? WE'RE PLAYING A GAME RIGHT NOW. THIS IS AN ENDURANCE TEST, IF YOU KNOW WHAT I MEAN." Kevin untied and removed his Adidas sneaker and began to grin.

Josh was clueless, but too busy trying to free himself from Kevin's fingers. He felt his surroundings changing quickly, dropping. And then Josh realized there was no more pressure on him. He was free-falling through the air. Suddenly, he became very afraid. "Kevin!"

But when he hit the ground, he was relieved. He wasn't dead, for one thing. He was on a bouncy, felt-like surface. "Where am I?" he wondered. And more importantly, where was Kevin?

Josh turned, seeing sight of something on one of the huge walls. It was a "14," in a bright circle. "Fourteen?" That's..."

He looked up with a sudden revelation, seeing Kevin above him. "No! C'mon, Kev! No!"

"SORRY JOSHY. IT WAS YOUR CHOICE. MY SOCKS SMELL PRETTY BAD THOUGH, MAN...SO JUST FOR YOU...I'M TAKING THEM OFF."

He removed his sweat-soaked white athletic socks and without another word, slid his foot into the shoe.

* * *

Josh began to scream when everything went dark. He saw Kevin's huge foot enter, and then realized it wasn't his foot. It was only his big toe. It struck him violently, throwing him deep into the cave. He rolled, bouncing on the sweat-inundated surface, until he reached the toe of the shoe. Immediately, like a gear or machinry going into place, Kevin's foot slid over him, his toes like claws over him. He wasn't stuck - there was room to move - but why would he? There was no nowhere to go, and the scent was beginning to make him lightheaded.

* * *

Kevin leaned close to his leg, shouting so Josh would hear him. "JOSH, YOU'RE SO TINY. THIS IS AMAZING. LISTEN, I'LL SEE YOU LATER. I HAVE TO GO TO MY ENGLISH CLASS, AND THEN I HAVE SOCCER PRACTICE!"
1431111122121111122211211.title: Undertow

choices: ...go to soccer with Josh
...go home and have some fun with Josh
14311111221211111222112111.content:
Kevin was on the ultimate power trip. He couldn't get enough of having a tiny person powerless at the soles of his feet. Power coursed through his body. He was enjoying have tiny little Josh underneath his manly soles.

Kevin almost forgot his english class. He stood up and put his full weight on his feet. His weight mashed poor Josh into the insole of the Adidas shoe. Kevin could feel Josh's body compress under his weight and he liked every second. Kevin knew Josh would be fine due to the fact that his Adidas shoes are very cushiony, it would mold to Josh's body. The only thing Josh had to worry about was surviving a day with the buff jocks feet.

Kevin started to walk. With every step he could feel Josh being pressed into the insole of the shoe. He smiled the whole way to class.

In class Kevin sat down releasing the pressure off of Josh. Josh started to move tickling Kevin's foot. Kevin quickly smashed down on Josh telling him to stop. Josh stopped and never moved again.

The whole day Kevin could feel the sweat collecting in his shoe. He was wondering how Josh was doing being held captive by a real man. He couldn't imagine what Josh was feeling now.

Finally class was over and it was time for soccer. Kevin sat in his seat for a few minutes thinking. He decided to...
14311111221211111222112111.title: Follow Kevin's point of view...

choices: Kevin teaches Josh who's boss.
Josh pleads for mercy.
1431111122121111122211212.content:
With his back turned, the first inkling that Josh had of the approach of the huge hand was the sudden reduction in the light reaching him. Before he had a chance to turn around, Kevin's huge hand was nearly on him.

Since Josh was so small, all Kevin had to do was reach into approximately his location and was sure he'd have him somewhere in his fist when he closed it.

It wasn't so cut and dry for Josh. As the gigantic hand approached Josh ducked. It was like the sky falling in on him and he thought maybe he could be too small to be picked up. As Kevin began to curl his fingers under his hand, Josh saw that that wouldn't be the case as even for a man as small as him, space was running out.

He rolled to try to avoid one finger tip when he bumped into another and still wound up inside of Kevin's fist. All light, all air was cut off as Josh felt himself leave the ground.

He was turned upside down as Kevin righted his hand and then slowly began to open it, grinning hugely when he saw Josh's tiny form near the base of his middle finger.
1431111122121111122211212.title: The Sky is Falling

choices: What happens next?
14311111221211111222112122.content:
Josh was reeling from the shock of being thousands of relative feet into the air; everything around him was still spinning, and he grabbed onto the most solid thing he could find and clung to it like an elm in a hurricane, waiting for the storm to stop. Things went dark, and then became illuminated once more. Josh realized that he had been holding onto Kevin's enormous finger. It was thicker and more sturdy than the strongest tree trunk, it was hundreds of feet around.

Embarassed by his show of weakness, he quickly let go of it, only to trip on the soft and warm skin of Kevin's hand; he fell onto his knees.

Above him, Kevin was smiling down on him, grinning at how futile his tiny friend's mere attempts at balance were. He waited until Josh managed to stand up for a second, and then he jerked his hand, enjoying his friend's trials and tribulations.

"JOSH, JOSH, JOSH...DO YOU REALLY THINK YOU CAN EVEN LIVE WITHOUT ME NOW? YOU BETTER SHAPE UP."

Kevin knew what he was saying was somewhat obnoxious, but he wanted to strike fear in Josh's heart. He wanted him to shiver, to be completely powerless.

Josh knew that he had to appease Kevin somehow, to get him to stop worrying about him and give him an ounce of freedom. Kevin was like his supreme dictator, he couldn't stand without his permission, or, remembering the hand closing around him, even breathe!

"Kevin...please..."

Kevin couldn't understand Josh's voice, but he could interpret quite accuratley the pained expression. "JOSH...GET ON YOUR KNEES."

He did so.

"PUT YOUR HAND ON YOUR HEAD."

He did so, and Kevin smirked at the immature commands, but he knew they meant more than that. They meant that Kevin was slowly gaining psychological power, as well as physical power, over Josh. And that made all the difference...
14311111221211111222112122.title: Psychology

choices: Kevin returns ready for fun and games
Someone else visits the apartment
143111112212111112221122.content:
Josh awoke, suffering a very bad headache, sprawled in the concave basin at the bottom of a very long drop from the lip of a glass test tube.

Although the glass distorted his vision, he recognized his surroundings. The glass tube, suspended in a rack, no doubt also purloined by Kevin from the laboratory, allowed the quarter-inch-tall man a 360 degree view of Kevin's cluttered apartment.

No sign of Kevin, however.

Josh wondered about the location of his titanic friend. Or former friend.

"What have I gotten myself into?" the tiny, imprisoned man wondered aloud.

He had no way of getting back to Zac's brother's lab. He had no way of even freeing himself from the test tube.
143111112212111112221122.title: Test Tube Prisoner

choices: Melting ice cream is sticky and no good for skiing
Josh becomes a tiny human snowboarder
1431111122121111122211221.content:
Josh sat at the bottom of the test tube, which seemed almost 150-feet deep to the tiny man.

He could not believe that he had willingly permitted Kevin to shrink him to such a tiny, helpless size.

At just that moment, the apartment's door opened. Josh scrambled to his feet as he saw Kevin enter the room. His friend now looked more than 1,800 feet tall.

Each footstep on the apartment's hardwood floor set off a series of vibrations that Josh could feel as they reverberated through the wooden floorboards.

The shrunken man pounded on the glass walls. "Kevin! Get me out of here! Kevin! Do you hear me?"

"Ready for fun and games?" Kevin asked in a booming voice as he lowered his towering face toward the test tube.

"You promised to grow me back!" Josh yelled.

His feeble voice, of course, went unheard. He looked through the glass and saw the huge grin begin to spread across Kevin's massive facial features.

"I have a surprise for you," the colossal man announced.

Kevin picked up the test tube and began to tilt the container. With no possible means of preventing the action, Josh began to slide helplessly along the length of the tube. He slid past the lip of the tube and fell through space until, after about a drop of 15 feet, he landed in Kevin's open palm.

"I can't believe it!" Kevin exclaimed. "I'm holding you in my hand."

Josh tried one last time. "You can't keep me like this," Josh shouted.

"You always liked to ski," Kevin said, as he began walking through the apartment.

Josh fell onto hands and knees, afraid of the scenery that became a blur as Kevin rapidly crossed the room.

Kevin lowered his palm to a tabletop. "Get off," he said, tilting his palm to force Josh to obey.

The tiny man dropped more than three body lengths to the tabletop. By the time he scrambled back onto his feet he saw Kevin moved to his refrigerator. He opened the freezer and removed a huge carton of vanilla ice cream.

Josh watched as Kevin found an ice cream scoop. The enormous utensil scooped two huge mounds of ice cream onto a saucer.

Kevin moved the saucer with the two frozen mounds of frozen dairy product onto the tabletop.

"Want to ski on ice cream, little buddy?" Kevin asked.

Josh began to back away. When he saw Kevin's hand move toward him, he began to run.

His flight didn't get far at all before Kevin's hand landed in his path.

The hand slid across the tabletop, forcing Josh back onto the outstretched palm.

His tiny friend again in hand, Kevin lifted his hand over the ice cream and dropped Josh onto one of the frozen mounds.
1431111122121111122211221.title: Kevin's Sense of Fun

choices: a spoon.
more ice cream.
14311111221211111222112211.content:
The first thing that Josh felt, or rather, didn't feel, was his legs. Ice cream was cold to a normal person, but when it was one hundred times its normal size, mere contact with Josh's legs made them numb. He stumbled to climb up the mound of ice cream, which seemed to be a hill. He kicked into it, trying to find a place to hold onto, but he only succeeded in getting his leg stuck inside the vanilla ice cream. Josh pulled on his leg as much as he could, but he couldn't get it loose.

"TRYING ICE CLIMBING INSTEAD, JOSH?" Kevin said, smiling. Josh turned to Kevin's billboard face, screaming for help. Kevin just smiled, relishing the power he had over his friend Josh. Kevin moved right by the saucer, taking a seat at the couch in front of the coffee table.

"Kevin! I won't let you get away with this, you bastard! Let me go or -- "

Josh's plea was suddenly cut short as something struck the side of the saucer, sending powerful vibrations throughout the ice cream and himself. Josh's leg surprisingly came free of the ice cream, and Josh tumbled down the frigid hill to the bottom of the saucer. A flurry of vanilla particles came down on him. At the same time, the ice cream was melting. It was getting on his clothes and on his skin...he realized things were getting very sticky.

Josh looked up to see that Kevin had caused the avalanche. And to his surprise, he was holding...
14311111221211111222112211.title: Avalanche

choices: Track and field - on the living room floor
Obstacle Course
143111112212111112221122111.content:
Oddly enough, the first thought that struck Josh was that this is what it must look like when people claimed to see flying saucers. Kevin held the spoon steady, its belly facing upward and looking so large that it looked large enough to put a pond in. From under it, the bottom was silvery and platinum, reflecting tiny movements and distorting colors.

And collecting ice cream, as well.

Kevin dug the spoon into the mound of ice cream.

* * *

The striking of the spoon against the mound of ice cream caused a significant enough disturance to knock Josh loose. He rolled around in the sticky, melting ice cream, trying to gain his balance, freezing all at the same. The spoon descended and Josh screamed. It was not, however, coming for him. It took a huge scoop of vanilla ice cream and carried it back up into Kevin's mouth and repeated the action, Kevin enjoying his bowl of ice cream while Josh dove out of the way of the spoon when it came down. To scare Josh, Kevin would sometimes bring the spoon very close to him, or even chase him around with it. Once, he took a large piece of ice cream in the spoon, then dumped it onto Josh. It was like a soft mountain falling on him, but luckily, it was too soft to make much of an impact. Josh did, however, freeze his ass off.

Once Kevin had eaten all the ice cream, he eyed his small friend laying in the bottom of the bowl, panting, in a tiny puddle of melted ice cream. He reached down, scooping Josh into his spoon, and then began to wonder what kind of fun they would have next.
143111112212111112221122111.title: Kevin's Snack

choices: That ice cream looks mighty tasty to giant Kevin!
Kevin carries Josh to the bathroom to get cleaned up!
14311111221211111222112212.content:
Josh fell through the air for a moment, and hit the soft ice cream. His legs were almost completly embedded in the frozen mound before he stopped. Before he could even get his bearings, he felt an intense cold from the ice cream all around his legs.

Because the ice cream was just starting to melt, there was a thick liquid at freezing temperature all around his legs, that felt like thousands of needles stabbing into his skin.

He instinctively tried to pull his legs out of the sticky cold mess as fast as he could, but couldn't get any leverage. The ice cream just wasn't solid enough, and all he ended up doing was covering his hands and arms in it as well. He heard something loud and looked up to see Kevins enourmous face grinning down at him.

Kevin was chuckling to himself while watching poor tiny Josh struggle in the mound of Kevin's ice cream.

Josh felt a combination of anger at Kevin and fear seeing him at this angle, and realizing the situation he was in. As he started to feel his legs go numb, all the while Kevin just grinned down at him, he yelled up to the giant "Kevin, PLEASE let me out of this! We can talk about this later okay?" but he wasn't even sure Kevin heard him, or if Kevin was even listening.

Then Kevin boomed down to him, "SORRY I DON'T HAVE ANYTHING YOU CAN USE AS A SNOWBOARD BUT I MIGHT BE ABLE TO HELP YOU EXPERIENCE A RIDE THERE" and before Josh could even think of what Kevin might mean, he saw Kevin reach out one of his massive hands, and stretch out his index finger.. the massive fingertip slowly came towards him, and Josh thought Kevin might mean to just push him under the surface, but the fingertip hit him in his back and pushed him away from his little trap, but kept pushing him even when his legs got free.. Kevin was pushing him down and around the mound of ice cream, as if he was skiing or boarding down it himself.

It didn't hurt him, which surprised him, and as the speed increased, he began to feel almost like he was on some kind of amusement park ride. If only the ice cream wasn't so cold and sticky.

Then Josh began to wonder just why he was having those thoughts. That wasn't right.

Kevin was playing with him, and this just wasn't right. He shouldn't feel like he's having fun, he should be totally ticked at Kevin. As he struggled with his conflicting feelings, Kevin stopped pushing him.

Josh looked way up into Kevin's face, and Kevin was now just smiling down at him. "WASN'T THAT FUN LITTLE GUY?"

Josh seemed to lose the feeling of fun that he was having when he heard Kevin use the term "Little Guy".

Josh wanted to yell up at him in anger, but then felt himself rising. He was shocked, and looking at Kevin, realized Kevin was just as surprised. As Kevin went to remove his finger, found that Josh was stuck to the tip of it from the sticky ice cream. Kevin suddenly erupted with laughter at this unexpected surprise at Josh's expense, but to poor Josh, the laughter was a thunderous roar, that was deafening to him. "Kevin.... Please!!" he pleaded, but his own pleas were drowned out by the giants laughter.

Finally Kevin stopped laughing, but kept a huge grin on his face as he held the pathetic-looking speck sized Josh in front of his face. Josh still covered in ice cream, stuck to his giant friend's fingertip, was beginning to feel better as the body heat from Kevin's finger and Kevin's warm breath washing over his tiny body, began to warm him up.

"WELL, YOU ARE QUITE A MESS AREN'T YOU? LOOKS LIKE ITS TIME FOR YOU TO GET WASHED UP NOW" Kevin spoke down to Josh, who by now was too exhausted to even try to argue with the giant.

Kevin used his other hand to grab Josh and drop him into his giant palm, then began to think of the best way to get Josh cleaned up.
14311111221211111222112212.title: The Mountain of ice cream

choices: Josh at three inches
Josh at twelve inches
Quarter inch
143111112212111112222.content:
A few days passed and Eric kept thinking about Josh. Eric wanted to be faithful to Tom but he wanted a closer look at Josh's body.

Josh and friends went back to finish their beach trip while Eric tried to work out the glitches in his shrink ray. When Josh and friends got back to town, Eric contacted them. "Josh, I heard a little of your conversation with Kevin, enough to know your interested in being shrunk but you're afraid. I'd like to have you be a guinea pig for future experiments and I can give you two assurances to calm your fears. First, I won't shrink you as small as I was. Second, Zac, James and anyone else you wish may know about this so we can hold each other accountable."

*****

Eric, Josh, Zac, James and Kevin gathered in the lab. Josh said, "I invited Kevin because he has great ideas most of the time. I wouldn't mind trying some of his ideas as long as the rest of you keep him from trying his more extreme ideas."

So with his friends watching, Josh prepared to be shrunk. Eric took aim and fired.
143111112212111112222.title: Josh turns down Kevin's offer

choices: They go to the gym
They decide who should watch over Josh tonight
1431111122121111122221.content:
Josh looked up at his towering friends. He knew they would look like giants but he was still awestruck by the scale. His friends were more than twenty times taller than him. They were like sky scrapers.

Eric picked Josh up. This was a change of perspective for him, his first time to hold a human in his hands. His desire to have a closer look grew.

Josh looked down at the floor that looked about two thousand feet away. Josh felt afraid of being held at this height.

Eric said, "Now I need to examine you to make sure there are no side effects. Please remove your clothes."

Josh protested but Eric persuaded the friends to his side. Kevin said, "Come on, Josh, don't be such a wuss." Kevin grabbed Josh's clothes and helped him strip.

Josh covered his privates. He felt intimidated by his friends.

Zac had thoughts about how Josh was like a pet. Zac hadn't been responsible enough for a pet but he wanted a pet. He thought about how easy it would be to care for Josh as his pet since Josh could do some things for himself.

James had thoughts about how Josh was like a doll or toy. James kept a few of his childhood toys as keepsakes. He felt nostalgic looking at toy sized Josh.

Kevin's thoughts were more about the power he had over Josh while Eric's thoughts were more sexual in nature. "Alright, Josh, stop covering yourself. I have to examine your genitals."

Eric lifted Josh's hands above his head. Josh's cock was huge for Josh's current size. "Are you normally this hung or was there a glitch in the shrinking?"

"I am normally this hung."

Eric finished the examination and Josh asked, "Grow me back now?"

"I'm concerned about your genital size. I can't risk growing you back until I confirm it's not a glitch."

*****

Zac, James and Kevin walked down the sidewalk chatting. Josh rode in Zac's hands.
1431111122121111122221.title: Josh at three inches

14311111221211112.content:
Kevin and Josh continued to watch the tv. Still passed out on the floor, Eric was suddenly awakened as Zak and James walked out the door.

He looked around and saw Kevin and Josh sitting on the bed. He wondered where his brother and James had gone. The tv caught his attention because he could here his name being mentioned numerous times. He could then also hear Josh asking Kevin where his other sneaker had gone. Kevin explained the situation with the phantom sharp object he felt and couldnt find, and how he threw it across the room in frustration.

Eric was out in the open, and noticed a half eaten bag of potato chips on the floor. Kevin got up off the bed and was headed in Eric's direction. Eric quickly dove into the bag for cover. He could hear Kevin getting closer and closer by his footfalls. He stopped just short of the bag, and Eric could feel him standing over the bag. Kevin had come to collect his sneaker. He slipped it on and to his suprise, there was no sharp object remaining.

"Lets get out of here," Kevin told Josh. "Like they said, no sense in us wasting our time in here."

"I agree," Josh said. "Lets leave this dump for awhile. You better pick that bag of chips up though, or more of those damn roaches are gonna be in here."

"Screw those dirty pieces of crap," Kevin yelled. "Let them show themeselves, and this is whats gonna happen."

Inside the bag, Eric did not like where this was going. Kevin raised his Adidas high above the potato chip bag. It got quiet and Eric wondered what was going on. Not having a chance to blink an eye, the walls around Eric flattened and he was immediately crushed. The last think he heard was CRUUUNCH!

Outside, Kevin's shoe loomed for a quick second in the air. In an instant it came crashing down toward the bag. There was a loud crunch as the bag of chips flattened under his sole. Any idea that Eric had been in there was useless, as the sound of the chips being pulverized into the floor covered up the sound of Eric's bones being mashed along with them.

"You see," Kevin said as he then lifted his foot off the bag and kicked it across the floor. "You dont cross my path and live to tell about it. Even if you are just a bag of chips. You get turned into dust under my sole."

Josh laughed and they headed for the door. The bag of chips and remains of Eric had landed in front of the door. Kevin made a point to step down on it as he walked over, giving it a twist. He felt another small crunching sound under his sole, which this time happend to be what was left of Eric.

"Dust I tell ya," Kevin laughed. Josh followed behind Kevin out the door. He just couldnt pass up the opportunity, so he timed his step to bring his Nike down right on top of the bag as well. The remaining chips gave way under Josh with a crackle. He drug the bag under his sole out the door and to the sidewalk. Leaving the bag there, the guys continued on to the beach. The bag was left to be trampled a few more times by passing guests at the motel. It was later picked up by the cleaning crew and tossed in the trash.
14311111221211112.title: All that...and a bag of chips

1431111122121112.content:
Eric said what the hell and began running towards the massive fingers. This could be his only hope to be saved. He jumped up and attached himself to the finger. His arms and legs wrapped around tightly.

"What the....," Eric heard Kevin say from outside the sneaker. Going along for the ride, Eric held on for dear life as the fingers retracted from inside the shoe. Kevin brought his hand up to his face to see a small insect like creature attached to his finger.

"Another nasty parasite," he yelled out as he tried to shake it free of his hand. "Time for you to die bug!"

Eric was screaming for his life, but Kevin had no way of hearing him. He was loosing his grip from the finger as Kevin continued trying to shake him off. Finally Eric lost his grip and went flying across the room landing on the rug.

Kevin got off the bed and headed toward the bug on the floor with his sneaker in hand. Eric layed on the rug half in a daze. He could see a large shadow headed toward him. His vision returned in time to see Kevin kneeling over him. His sneaker in his hand held high over his head.

"This should teach you not to mess with me you little piece of crap," Kevin said as gripped tigher around his sneaker. "Let me introduce you to my sneaker again," he said laughing.

Eric looked up in horror as the heel of the sneaker came barreling down toward him, and a look of satisfaction on Kevin's face. The last thing he saw was the Adidas logo on the sole as he blacked out.

Kevin brought his shoe to the floor with a thomp. It was a great pleasure to him to see the lifeless insect laying there as he raised his sneaker up. He enjoyed the power of ending the life of something so insignificant.

"Now its time for me to go have more fun," Kevin said outloud. "You stay right there, and I'll get you later before the guys come back," he laughed as he talked to his little victim on the floor.

He slipped on his Adidas and walked out of the room to the beach. About a half hour later, Eric still laying on the floor, began to move. He was groaning and in great pain. The sneaker hadnt killed him, just knocked him unconcious. It was hard for him to move at all. He just looked around in confusion. The room was dark, and he couldnt do a thing at the moment to help himself.

The door unlocked, and he could hear voices. The door opened and in came a figure that he couldn't make out. It was coming right toward him.

"You could have at least turned the light on when you came in Josh," Eric heard his brother Zak say. It was good to hear his voice. In that instant, Zak flipped the light on and to Eric's dismay he saw Josh walking above him. Josh was wearing a pair of Nike Shox. As Eric lay stunned, he watched in slow motion as Josh's left sneaker raised in the air targeting to fall right where Eric was. Eric watched the sneaker sole get closer and closer.

As Josh continued to walk into the room, his sneaker came down with a loud crunch on top of something.

"See what happens," Zak said. "What did you step on?"

Josh turned around and looked at the floor. There was a small pile of goo stuck in the rug. He lifted his Nike and looked at the bottom.

"Ewwww...gross," he said. "It was only a bug, and its guts are all stuck in my treads."

"At least it was nothing important," Zak said. "Yea it could have been a bottle of beer," James chuckled. "Kevin is gonna be pissed though that you got it and he didnt," Zak said as they all started to laugh.

Josh walked outside and began wiping his sole on the ground. Whatever was left of Eric, fell off from the treads and into the grass.
1431111122121112.title: Shocked

choices: Kevin dumps the "bug" into a drawer for "later"
Kevin dumps the "bug" onto the floor
143111112212112.content:

declared, staring down into the shadowy
interior of his shoe.

Eric, hearing the words, looked up to see the
giant glaring down at him. "No! Not a bug!
Help!" Eric began leaping and waving his
arms.

"Oh, think you're gonna get away!" Kevin said,
laughing as he lowered his hand toward his
shoe.

"No! Zac! Help me! Someone help me!" Eric
screamed.

Eric's extremely tiny size and Kevin's
beer-fogged mind kept the giant jock from
focusing in detail on the entrapped professor.

He grabbed his shoe in one hand. He then
lowered one of his massive feet into his other
shoe, getting prepared for a satisfying stomp.
"No bug crawls into my shoe and lives to tell
about it," Kevin boasted.

"That's the truth," Josh joked. "I'm surprised
the smell didn't finish it off."

Kevin's three friends laughed uproariously at
Josh's comment about Kevin's smelly shoe.

"Sure is an ugly bastard!" Kevin said, staring

He ignored his three friends.

"This won't take but a second!" Kevin retorted.

Help! Don't let him stomp me!"
143111112212112.title: Fate Delivers Him Into Kevin's Hands

choices: Make a break for it out of the dresser.
Hide inside one of Kevins socks or his boxers.
1431111122121121.content:
"Dammit guys, you all are no fun," Kevin sneered. "I could easily wipe this little parasite out of existance with just one quick stomp."

"We know that, and the one you smashed into oblivion earlier sure as hell knows it," Zak said. "But we gotta get to the store before it closes, or we have no brew." "Yea, put your little toy away for now and play with it later," Josh said jokingly. "We dont have the time, and Im sure the little shit doesnt mind waiting for you to come back and mash it," Josh laughed.

All the while, Eric still inside the sneaker was jumping and yelling trying to get either his brothers or Kevins attention. They didnt even notice. After he heard what was planned on their return, he was getting scared.

"Alright, but this little shit has a date with the bottom of my Adidas when we get back," Kevin replied with an evil tone. He shook the shoe a bit back and fourth and Eric began to bounce around inside.

Thinking it was probably a good place, Kevin walked over to the dresser with his shoe and Eric. He opened the top drawer and overturned his sneaker. Eric came toppling out, but had a soft landing as this drawer contained Kevins socks and underwear. He came to rest on a pair of Kevins giant socks. He looked up to see his brothers face, and the faces of his friends looking down at him. He felt the ground moving below him, and the light was quickly disappearing.

"Man, stuck in there with your socks and underwear," Zak said. "Good thing you are gonna put it out of its misery later, I cant think of a worse place to be."

"Look who's talking Zak," James retorted. "The rank smell in your sneakers is enough to kill a damn horse, let alone that little thing."

The guys all started to laugh as Eric was closed up inside the dresser. He put his other shoe back on and they walked out of the room to get their beer.

Eric sat in the dark drawer on top of the sock. Contemplating how he was going to get out of this and remain alive to hopefully return himself to normal. As his eyes adjusted to the dark, Eric looked around at his surroundings. A few pairs of Kevins socks were on the left, where he was at the moment, and over on the other side looked to be some boxers. Behind the boxers, Eric noticed a small patch of light coming through. He made his way off the sock and stood in front of the boxers.

The boxers were nearly ten times his size. Being so close to them was making Eric think of his boyfriend Tom. He truly missed him at this moment, and hoped he would survive this to see him again. Then he snapped back to the situation at hand. Investigating that bit of light he had seen. It was behind the boxers that laid before him. It seemed the only way to reach his destination was to travel thru the boxers to the back of the drawer. He picked a piece of the fabric near the leg hole and crawled in.

It was even darker in here, and he could smell the musty scent of a man everywhere. He countinued his journey along the fabric trail, until he finally ended up where he wanted to be. He poked his head out of the waistband, and right in front of him was a small hole in the back of the dresser. He didnt know how it got there, but it was big enough for him so squeeze thru.

Just as he had made his discovery, he heard noises and voices from outside. He didnt know what to do. Should he squeeze thru the hole and see about getting saved without getting squashed. Or should he try to hide in one of Kevins socks or boxers in the hopes that his brothers friend would think his next victim got away?
1431111122121121.title: Saved for the Moment

choices: Make another attempt to gain attention
Choose a bag for the eventual ride back home
14311111221211211.content:
His promised "date with the bottom of Kevin's Adidas" was the foremost thought in Eric's brain as he heard the return of his huge brother and his friends.

He squeezed his tiny body through the hole in the back of the dresser— and found himself looking at a vertical drop to the dirty brown shag carpet.

"Now for that little bug!" Kevin's voice sounded extremely loud and determined.

As Kevin opened the drawer, the entire structure shook from the giant's violent action. Eric lost his precarious balance and fell toward the carpeted floor. Fortunately, the soft shags cushioned the impact of his fall.

"Damn!" Kevin's voice was furious. "It got out!"

Eric, leaping to his feet, ran beneath the shadowy space between the bottom of the nightstand and the carpet. He didn't want the dangerous giant finding him.

"Forget about that bug!" Josh advised. "We came here to enjoy the beach, not stomp all the bugs in this infested motel."

"Yeah," agreed James. "Besides, we told them at the front desk about their bug problem. Didn't they say they would call an exterminator in the morning?"

"Yeah, let those guys have the fun of getting rid of the bugs. They're professionals," Zac said. "I'm getting myself a beer and heading down to the beach. Anyone want to come with me?"

Josh and James agreed eagerly.

Kevin pushed aside some of his socks and underwear, making sure the little bug hadn't found a clever hiding place. In defeat, he yelled at his buddies to count him in.

After the four enormous giants left the room, tiny Eric crept from beneath the gigantic nightstand. He had been horrified while listening to the conversation.

Unless he took some initiative, he had a date with a professional exterminator.

He could try again to contact his brother or his huge friends, but the thought of another case of mistaken identity with Kevin could prove disastrous for him.

He saw the titanic pieces of luggage the guys had brought along on their trip. Well, he thought, it would be better than stowing away in a shoe. He knew he needed to get out of this deadly hotel room and back to his laboratory.

What should he do?
14311111221211211.title: Out of the Drawer

choices: Josh showers, watched by a tiny stowaway
Josh needs something from his bag
143111112212112112.content:
Eric approached the assembled luggage belonging to his brother and his friends. The gigantic bags looked the size of a city block to the diminutive man.

He felt his confidence ebb. He was too small. This would be impossible.

Then, he remembered what he faced— this motel room where he was stranded would be subjected to the services of a professional exterminator in less than 24 hours.

With renewed incentive and determination, Eric approached the towering pieces of luggage.

As he surveyed the different articles of luggage, he noticed that a yellow and black duffel bag was unzipped. The crumpled bag offered a means of getting into the bag.

Eric began to scale the bag. The folds in the bag's material offered a crude series of steps. Eventually, he managed to pull himself to the top of the open bag. Standing on the metal track of the zipper, he peered into the bag.

Socks, boxer shorts and a couple of T-shirts had been tossed haphazardly into the bag. He could not determine the bag's owner. Nor did it matter.

"I simply need to stow away long enough to get home," the bug-sized man said aloud.

He lowered himself over the edge, his tiny fingers gripping the metal track of the zipper. Then, he dropped the equivalent of 20 feet onto some balled socks. He bounced and then landed heavily on a broad expanse of black boxers with a crisscrossing of red circles.

He was in the bag.

He was still cowering in the enormous confines of the bag when he heard the loud commotion that announced the return of his giant brother and his equally gigantic friends.

•••••••

The guys had enjoyed their day at the beach. Now, though, all they wanted to do was crash for a few hours before heading out to enjoy some night life.

Zac collapsed on a bed. Josh and Kevin sat on the other bed.

"I'm gonna take a shower," announced Josh.

"Whatever, man," Kevin said, flopping onto his stomach on the bed. "Don't use all the hot water."

"I just hope this dump has hot water," Josh remarked.

He grabbed up his yellow and black duffel bag and headed into the motel room's bathroom.

143111112212112112112.content:
Eric sprinted across the tiles of the bathroom

He had covered only a few inches when he
