Meanwhile, Kevin had thought better of his
hesitation. He would never rest easy knowing
there was a disgusting bug loose in the motel
room.
The thump of Kevin's huge bare feet as they
slapped on the tiles helped Eric make his
decision. He plunged through the jagged
crevice at the base of the wall. He brushed
past the corroded pipe and plunged deeper
into the dark space.
"Damn!" Kevin shouted.
Well, if he could not squash the bug, he would
damn sure make certain it did not re-enter the
motel room. Kevin rolled off several sheets of
toilet paper and crammed the tissue into the
space around the pipes. He kept stuffing the
tissue until they completely blocked the crack.
Inside...
143111112212112112112.title: A Moment's Hesitation

choices: Somehow, some way, Eric escapes!
Some roaches get stuck with Eric
1431111122121121121121.content:
Tiny Eric reflected on how truly puny he had
become that a few sheets of tissue stuffed
into the crack around the huge rusted pipe
was enough to seal him inside the motel
bathroom wall.
He shouted for help until he grew hoarse. He
explored for alternative exits, but found none.
Finally, unable to resist, he curled up on the
hard floor and entered a fitful sleep.
••••••
Loud noises and a sudden inrush of light into
the dark crevice jerked Eric awake. He wasn't
sure how long he had been asleep.
Someone had removed the tissue barrier.
He crept toward the jagged space around the
huge pipe.
He peered out into the huge bathroom.
•••••••
Two men dressed in work boots and a
uniform of gray overalls stomped around the
bathroom. One gave the room a quick survey,
reached down and removed some toilet paper
stuffed into a crack around the pipes hooked
to the toilet.
He tossed the wad of paper into a wastecan
and directed his assistant's attention to the
space. "Be sure to give that extra attention," he
said. "That's probably how a lot of the bugs
are getting in."
•••••••
Eric's exhausted mind tried to ascertain what
had become of Zac and his friends. He knew
he needed to reach them. He didn't trust these
huge strangers.
With the giant's directing their attention
elsewhere in the room, Eric emerged and
crept along the baseboard, refusing to expose
himself in the wide open spaces of the
bathroom floor.
•••••••
Suddenly, one of the giants turned and walked
toward the toilet. Eric kept his back against the
baseboard and stared up in horror at the
building-sized tank strapped onto the giant's
back.
He recognized the men. "They're
exterminators," he cried, called no doubt to
take care of the infestation reported to the
motel's management.
The giant's huge feet stomped past Eric's
location. Eric watched as the giant used his
huge cylinder to empty a dose of toxin into his
former hiding place.
At the same time, the other giant was busy in
other parts of the room.
•••••••
Eric realized with a shocked jolt of defeat that
Zac and his buddies must have departed for
home — without him! Now, he was truly
marooned on his own.
"Spray along the wall!" The giant told his
assistant. "I'll take care of the rest of the other
room."
Eric began to run. He knew he needed to
escape the bathroom.
The giant assistant began to direct a stream
of toxin along the baseboard. Ahead of him,
inexplicably, Eric saw a large, square
structure. There was an opening on one side.
The lethal stream of toxin was coming closer!
Eric dived into the odd structure.
He landed almost in the center of the square,
impacting softly in a layer of an odd, greasy
substance. He tried to stand, but found
himself stuck. The substance was extremely
sticky as well.
•••••••
The exterminator looked around the bathroom.
"Well, we've given it a good spraying and I put
out several roach traps. We'll check back
tomorrow and see if it's working."
The two giants left the motel room.
•••••••
"No," Eric screamed, overhearing the giant
and realizing that he had stumbled into one of
the roach traps!
1431111122121121121121.title: Roach Motel

choices: One of the giant exterminators returns.
The exterminators return.
14311111221211211211212.content:
Eric flailed around in the bug box trying to free himself. With all the strength he could muster, the tiny man managed to sit up in the box, but his legs and butt were firmly stuck. Eric smelled the toxic fumes left from the spraying of the giant exterminator as they slowly seeped into his little cardboard prison. He prayed the roach trap would as least shelter him from a lethal amount of the dreaded poison. The aroma from the sticky surface Eric was trapped in emitted a nauseating slightly sweet smell, no doubt to lure unsuspecting roaches to their doom. Eric was exhausted, but he had to avoid laying down and becoming even more stuck. Eric had an excellent view of the bathroom from the opening in the box. He noticed another roach trap had been placed a couple feet away from the one he was in. Eric was horrified as the deadly liquid covering the baseboard almost seemed to sizzle. The bug-sized man knew he would have been toast had the giant exterminator doused him with any of that deadly bug-spray.

Hours passed and Eric fought with all his might to stay upright inside the horrible roach trap. As the sun set, the bathroom was getting dark. The meager man knew that soon he would be surrounded by total darkness. Eric wondered if there was any possible way out of this nightmare. Who would look inside a roach trap for a shrunken human being? And what the hell would those monster-sized men do with the roach trap he was trapped in when they returned.

"Oh Shit!" Eric screamed as he saw a black flash swoosh across the bathroom floor. And then he saw another one. "Oh my God, what was that?"

Eric gasped as he saw a big ugly cockroach approach the opening of the roach box and peer in. The aroma from within the box was attracting the hideous roach. The half-inch tall man yelled at the roach in a futile attempt to scare it away, but the roach had no fear of the puny little man that was about a third its size.

The filthy roach crawled into the roach trap and became stuck right at the edge. As the roach tried to break free, the entire box shook violently. Eric held his hands up in disgust as roach whiskers brushed against him. After a couple minutes, the roach broke free and fled the bug trap, leaving tiny Eric the sole prisoner of this horrible device. No other roaches approached the roach trap. Eric guessed that the roach had told all his friends of the danger. Eric held his head down in despair as he realized he was punier than a common roach. Eric heard the shuffling of the horrible roaches outside the box. The poison seemed to have no effect on them. Eric was helplessly trapped until the giants returned. He dozed off in a sitting position.
14311111221211211211212.title: Roach Checks Out

choices: The exterminator picks up the other roach trap.
The exterminator walks over to the other roach trap.
143111112212112112112121.content:
Eric was startled awake when he heard a door open. Bright light entered Eric's cardboard prison and he heard loud, powerful footsteps as they seemed to be rapidly approaching his location.

"Oh, please help me, someone please help...." Eric started to screamed but was silenced as a gargantuan work-boot crashed down inches from the roach trap. The colossal mass of scuffed, dirty leather filled tiny Eric's entire view. The enormous boot lifted slightly and shifted position right next to the roach trap. The tiny Professor was horrified at the sight of the massive boot, blocking the exit just inches away. Eric knew his voice was too puny to be heard, but he screamed in futile desperation. The intimidating boot lifted again and was out of sight. Eric almost began to cry as he feared the giant man was about to stomp down on the roach trap.
Eric was shaken violently as the powerful boot of the giant pounded the floor.

"What the hell is he doing?" Eric wondered out loud as he viewed the frightful work-boots of the mammoth exterminator stomp randomly about the bathroom. Eric watched in terror as the dangerous boots approached the other roach trap within his view. The tiny man looked on in awe as the hulking man knelt down and picked up the roach motel with one of his massive hands. The giant man held the little box up and looked inside.

"Well, it looks like I got a couple," the exterminator said to himself with a smile. The exterminator then held the little box in the palm of his hand and crushed it to a pulp in a matter of seconds. He let out a little laugh and then looked over at the other other roach trap, unaware of the tiny human man trapped inside, frozen with fear.
143111112212112112112121.title: An Exterminator Returns

choices: The giant exterminator puts the roach trap in his pocket.
The giant exterminator puts the roach trap in his bag of supplies.
1431111122121121121121212.content:
With one giant step, the towering colossus was right on top of the small roach trap. His enormous work-boot passed right over the roach motel. For a split second the giant exterminator thought about just pounding down on the little box with his foot and crushing it flat, but he was curious about how many roaches he had caught.

Eric was petrified when he saw the jumbo-sized man step over to where he was. When the giant's boot landed on the floor, the powerful aftershock jolted the little roach box and caused Eric to fall backwards. Eric started to panic as he realized he was completely stuck to the sticky surface of the roach motel. He was flat on his back and could not move at all. Then suddenly, the tiny man's stomach lurched as he felt the box being elevated fast and high. Eric remembered the fate of the other roach trap and began screaming in terror. Eric lifted his head just high enough to see a giant intimidating eye looking in at him and then a deep powerful voice drowned out his screams.

The enormous exterminator reached down and picked up the little roach trap to see how many roaches he had caught. He held it right up to his face and looked inside.

"Crap! Just one baby roach? That's all?" the giant man said with disappointment. Just as he was about to crush this one, he hesitated and thought for a moment. "Well, I guess I should save this one and use it later."
1431111122121121121121212.title: Just One Baby Roach

choices: Eric gets naked and escapes the trap
Nope! Eric's stuck securely in the trap
14311111221211211211212121.content:
The perspective inside the roach trap lurched suddenly for tiny, entrapped Eric as the gigantic exterminator stuffed the tiny cardboard trap into the pocket of his overalls.

Trapped in darkness, Eric remained securely stuck in the sticky residue within the roach trap. He had no idea of his location, but the air grew warm and somewhat stuffy. The sickening smell of the sticky substance that held him fast also intensified.

••••••

His next stop took the exterminator to a restaurant. He was only scheduled to inspect the restaurant, but was astonished to discover a heavy roach infestation.

"I've got a few traps with me that I can set out," the exterminator told the restaurant manager. "But I'll have to return tomorrow with some more powerful stuff. You've really got a major problem."

He reached into his pocket and pulled out the trap that held the entrapped Eric. He lowered the trap beneath a space under a large refrigerator case.

"You can check them yourself," he told the manager. "When it traps a bunch of the bugs, just toss it out in the trash."

The manager frowned in distaste. He made a mental note to make certain one of his employees got assigned to dispose of the gross traps.

••••••

Eric felt himself pulled from darkness, and then he felt the awful lurching motion as the trap descended rapidly.

Back in shadow, but with some light reaching inside the trap, he was now on his back again, still stuck in the roach trap glue.

"I've got to get out of here," he cried aloud.

He wondered if he could wiggle out of his clothes and leap out of the trap. He was skeptical but desperate.
14311111221211211211212121.title: Pressed Back into Service

choices: The waitress cuts the pie into slices.
The waitress takes the whole pie to the table of construction workers.
143111112212112112112121211.content:
Eric's hopes of escape and even his very survival began to fade as hunger and exhaustion set in. The nauseating ride in the giant exterminator's pocket had been quite traumatic for the trapped half-inch tall college Professor. The terrifying gaze from that gargantuan eye of the mammoth exterminator haunted Eric's thoughts. If only the giant had looked closer in the roach trap. Or if only Eric had not gotten stuck on his back. Maybe the exterminator would have noticed him, and not mistook him for a little roach.

"Or hell, if only I had not jumped into this god-awful roach trap in the first place!" the meager man thought to himself. "I have got to....oh....yeah!"

Eric had freed one of his arms from the sticky surface. The stickiness of the surface of the trap was losing some of its potency. Eric struggled with all his might, and lifted his other arm from the horrible glue-like substance. Then he managed to sit up. But as hard as the tiny man tried, he could not budge his legs from the gluey bottom.

Eric very carefully slid out of his pants, trying desperately not to allow his bare skin to come in contact with the sticky bottom. He was unstuck. He stood on his pants, and looked at the opening of the trap that now seemed so far away. He had to jump, but the tiny man would only get one chance. If he did not clear the opening, he would fall head-first onto the floor of the hideous roach-box. There, he would be trapped until he was disposed of by a giant.

Eric held his breath, got the tiniest of head starts, and jumped. He landed with a thud just outside the roach trap. He was free of the horrible cardboard bug prison. But where was he? Eric realized he was underneath some massive object. The floor was dirty and greasy. A plethora of noises filled the air. He cautiously walked up and looked out from his relatively safe hiding place and gasped. Eric was in the kitchen of a restaurant. A very busy restaurant. Eric stepped back as a giant busboy walked past him headed for the dish-washer. And then another giant walked past.

Eric's stomach growled. He was very hungry. Maybe he would try to contact a giant for help later, but now he had to find nourishment. He looked over and gazed at a food cart relatively close by. The bottom shelf was full of different pies and cakes. It would be difficult, but definitely possible to climb to the bottom shelf of the cart. His mouth watered as he looked at the jumbo-sized deserts. Without even watching for a giant, the tiny Professor sprinted for the desert-cart. Eric stopped to catch his breath at the base of the cart, and then began his climb.

In only about twenty minutes, Eric made it to the bottom shelf containing the incredible pies and cakes. He walked up in awe and was overwhelmed as he stood in front of a truly colossal chocolate pie. He scaled the side of the massive pie and stood in triumph on the edge. The bug-sized man bent over and scooped up a handful of luscious whipped cream mixed with a little chocolate. Then a sudden jolt caused him to lose his balance, and he fell right into the pie.

* * *

"Hey Suzie, how's about a piece of that delicious chocolate pie of yours?" the gruff looking construction worker asked the waitress. "And bring a couple slices for my buddies too."
143111112212112112112121211.title: Chocolate Pie

choices: Eric's luck finally ran out, but Jon enjoys a pie.
Eric manages to pull himself off the pie just in the nick of time.
1431111122121121121121212111.content:
Eric landed with an inaudible plop, face first through the whipped cream and into the chocolate of the pie. After a moments struggle he managed to flip himself over, now completely covered in only a miniscule amount of cream and chocolate, he wiped as much of it off his face as he could before he got a chance to look up and scream. A gigantic silver knife being wielded by a colossal woman was coming straight at the tiny man. Or at least it looked like.

The knife actually hit about an inch away from the tiny professor, lifted up moved further away from him and slammed back down into his new prison of sweetness. Then a few moments of (relative) calmness happened in which Eric tried swimming/running through the pie mix to get towards the crust. But the mix proved to be similar to quick sand in the more that Eric struggled the more he sank. Before getting a chance to change his plan Eric felt a lurching movement, saw his slice fly skyward and land on a vast white landscape. "If I can manage to pull myself over the edge..." Eric began pulling himself towards the edge of his slice as the world started moving again he screamed figuring this pie wasn't going to have much longer to survive and he was now waist deep in the thick mix.

-------------------------------

Suzie after having quickly cut up the pie a regular named Jon and his friends had ordered carried the slices of the pie out to the three good looking' (in a rough neck sort of a way) construction workers and placed down the slices.

"Thanks Hun." Jon's buddies Carl grinned at the waitress.
"No problem Sug." She blushed placing down a very special slice in front of Jon.

-------------------------------

Hearing the construction workers around him talking now Eric continued to scream as he saw a fork raise sky high and descend towards the pie.
1431111122121121121121212111.title: Food of the Gods... well sort of.

14311111221211211211212121111.content:
Jon wore a tight white tanktop that showed off his muscles and his deep tan. His shirt had some dirty spots from his work earlier in the morning at a construction site.

The side of the massive fork cut effortlessly through the thick chocolate mousse as Jon positioned his first bite of his favorite dessert at the diner.

Eric watched in dismay as the enormous hand worked the huge fork to sever a section of the pie from the main slice. His initial awe at the handsome giant’s appearance became replaced by terror as he realized he would be traveling with the very first bite toward the gigantic man’s open mouth.

The hungry construction worker piled a big bite of pie onto his fork and lifted it toward his mouth.

Eric screamed as the giant man lifted the fork toward his face. The tiny scientist simply could not believe he hadn’t been granted time to pull himself out of the sticky pie before the hungry man scooped him onto his fork on the very first bite.

Still mired waist deep in the chocolate goo, Eric could do little more than wave his arms over his head as he screamed.

“No!” Eric screamed as the fork entered the cavernous domain of Jon’s mouth. “Don’t eat me!”

Jon closed his mouth and pulled out the fork, feeling the gushy chocolate and whipped cream back up in his mouth in a delicious mound of sweet-tasting filling that literally began to melt in his mouth.

The fact the giant didn’t need to chew the melt-in-you-mouth pie provided Eric with his only glimmer of a silver lining as the situation turned increasing grim.

Trapped in the darkness, streams of saliva worked to loosen him from the melting chocolate pie. He feel until he landed on a vast undulating surface.

“Oh no,” Eric cried as he realized he had fallen onto the giant’s massive tongue.

In that same instant, the tongue moved and began to push Eric and a vast amount of liquified chocolate mousse toward the back of the giant’s throat. Eric tried to swim, but bashed against the tall enamel wall formed by Jon’s teeth.

Eric pounded against a massive molar. “Please! Let me out!”

Jon swallowed. “MMM, that’s good,” he said aloud.

As he spoke, light filtered into the giant’s mouth. Tiny Eric celebrated. He had managed to wedge himself in a crevice along Jon’s gums. Now, as he searched for a handhold, he only had to get out of the gigantic mouth.

“Hun, I almost forgot your coffee,” the waitress said. “I know how you like to have it with your pie.’

“Thanks,” Jon said. He lifted the cup to his lips and took in a sip of hot black coffee.

Eric, surprised as the mouth opened and the giant spoke again, tried to find a way out only to see a huge cup hover at the entrance to Jon’s mouth.

The shocking liquid that flowed out of the cup and into Jon’s mouth splashed into the tiny man and caused Eric to writhe in pain, which also resulted in his plunge down Jon’s throat with the quickly flowing coffee.

“Nooohh!” Eric screamed as he flowed with the flood of coffee beyond the point of any return into Jon’s stomach.

Jon tossed four crumpled dollar bills onto the table as a tip. “Thanks,” he told the waitress as he left the table. “That’s the best dessert I’ve enjoyed in a long time.”
14311111221211211211212121111.title: Damn Good Pie

choices: Back to the Construction Site
Jon brushes away some crumbs
14311111221211211211212121112.content:
In a last adrenaline-fueled move of desperation, the flailing tiny man pulled himself from the gooey chocolate pie and flung himself over the edge.

Eric fell, but not for the distance that he expected. He made impact against a vast field of white. Covered in sticky chocolate mousse, the little man didn't bounce. Instead, he remained stuck fast on the stretch of cotton fabric of Jon's T-shirt over the huge man's left pec.

His tiny body clung to the T-shirt, although he feared each movement made by the giant might dislodge him. To Eric's amazement, the giant consumed the gigantic slice of pie in only a couple of minutes.

••••••

Jon stood and pulled his wallet from his jeans. He counted out some bills, which he left on the table to pay for his meal.

He headed toward the door, ready to get back to his job at the construction site, completely unaware of the tiny passenger adhered by the sticky chocolate to his T-shirt.
14311111221211211211212121112.title: Stuck

choices: Try to climb to safer location
Eric falls into a pile of sand
143111112212112112112121211121.content:
A short distance to the left, tiny Eric, a half-inch tall speck of a man, sees a protuberance about the size of his body. The shape is concealed beneath the tight outline of the giant's T-shirt.

"It's a nipple!" Eric realizes with a mix of shock and awe.

He could almost stretch out a hand and touch the bump beneath the white fabric.

But, on second thought, he dare not move any more than absolutely necessary.

Only a thin layer of chocolate mousse, which had adhered the shrunken man to Jon's T-shirt, is keeping Eric safe with its defiance of gravity.

The ground, needless to say, is a long, long drop.

But, to realize he is no more than a human crumb on the sloppy construction worker's T-shirt is more than unnerving. Tiny Eric is completely demoralized.

•••••

Jon arrived back at the construction site, ready to get back to work. Checking with his foreman, Jon got to work unloading some materials. He soon began to work up a healthy sweat.

At the same time, beneath the sun, Jon's T-shirt began to get damp from sweat and the chocolate mousse began to melt.

A panicked Eric realized the pie stain would not hold him in place much longer...
143111112212112112112121211121.title: Giant Construction Site

choices: Chase after Jon
Attract Jake's attention
1431111122121121121121212111212.content:
Jon didn't notice when a small "crumb" slipped from his shirt and tumbled toward the ground at the construction site.

For tiny Eric, however, the harrowing plunge should have been the end of the shrunken scientist's misadventures.
Instead, he fell, relatively softly, on a massive desert of sand. The momentum of the impact caused the tiny man to roll good distance down a slope of a massive sand dune.

When the shaken but intact man managed to get onto his feet, he wondered about his new location. He didn't need to wonder for long.

An absolutely colossal work boot crushed down on the vast sand plain, missing tiny Eric by a narrow margin.

The little man gazed up in shock at huge Jon, who held a enormous shovel in his hand as he scooped sand to use to mix concrete.

Eric knew he needed to escape the hazardous sand trap, but he slipped several times on the constantly shifting sands as he fled from titanic Jon and his colossal work boots.

The little man ran valiantly despite his fear of an errant stomp on the part of the giant construction worker. As he neared the edge of the vast desert of sand, Eric saw another frightening sight.

Jake, the site foreman, approached the mound of sand. He looked quite intimidating from the perspective of the half-inch tall scientist. He stood about six feet four inches tall, weighed about 220 pounds, with massive muscles and some tattoos on his biceps and forearms.

Jon's foreman, Jake, approached him as he worked at the cement mixer. "We've got a truck of materials," Jake announced. "Give Bo and Luke a hand unloading it."

Taking advantage of his foreman's prerogative, Jake took a break. He leaned against a stack of bricks as he lit up a cigarette.

In the meantime, Eric gazed helplessly at the massive giants. These muscular construction workers scared him even more than would other giants. Their fierce visages didn't encourage him to expect mercy from these giants who would probably do no more than give a bug-sized speck a cursory glance before lifting a huge work boot to crush him.

But, his options limited, Eric faced an unwelcome choice...
1431111122121121121121212111212.title: Foreman Jake

choices: Eric runs!
Eric freezes!
14311111221211211211212121112122.content:
Tiny Eric left behind the vast wasteland of sand and hid in the shadow of a massive, rough-hewn wall. He reached out and touched the wall and realized he was touching a single brick that comprised a larger stack of bricks.

He heard a loud sigh and, still keeping his back to the wall of bricks, raised his head.

He saw the titanic construction foreman sigh and stretch. He held a cigarette the size of a small tree to his lips. Eric could not help but feel impressed and more than a little intimidated by the sheer scale of the huge man.

••••

Jake took in a deep draw on the cigarette and removed his hard hat in a sweeping motion. He stooped and placed the hard hat on the ground at his feet. He stretched again and took another deep drag on the cigarette. He used his free hand to adjust himself in his tight jeans.

•••••

Eric screamed as he saw a colossal orange object seem to fall from the heavens. In his fright, he scampered away from the safety of the wall of bricks. He saw a huge arm and hand withdraw, leaving behind the orange object. The foreman's hard hat looked as big as a sports arena. Eric, already several inches away from the bricks, moved closer to the towering hard hat. He raised his eyes and surveyed the rounded dome of the protective helmet. At that point, he heard a grunt and looked up in time to see the colossal giant adjusting a sizable bulge beneath his tight jeans.

•••••

Jake took a final draw on his cigarette and tossed the spent butt onto the ground.

•••••

Once again, Eric screamed as an incoming object hurtled toward him. The cigarette, still smoldering, landed only a few inches from the thoroughly terrified little speck of a man. The acrid stench filled his nostrils and stung his eyes.

•••••

Jake, ready to get back to work, raised his boot to grind out the smoking cigarette butt...
14311111221211211211212121112122.title: Construction Sites Are Dangerous Places

143111112212112112112121211121221.content:
(Note: Here's a chapter requested by gunit. He made the first request, so I am writing his request first)


Eric felt time stop as he found himself plunged into the shadow created by the giant's lifted work boot.

Each of his panicked heartbeats seemed to endure forever for the terrified professor.

Then, in an instant, a roar louder than an incoming tornado, assaulted Eric's ears as the colossal boot stomped the earth, missing him by only a fraction of distance.

Jake moved his boot back and forth, not even bothering to look down, to grind out the smoldering cigarette butt in the sand and gravel.

The tiny man's brain directed him to run, which he did, but he didn't get far at all before the boot impacted with the ground. A spray of sand and grit erupted all around the fleeing speck, leaving him blind and stumbling.

Eric tripped over a mere pebble, landing hard on his left knee. He managed a quick intake of breath before he saw the colossal arm descending toward him.

"No!" Eric managed to cry.

But the giant hand grabbed the orange hard hat from the ground.

Eric, still unable to get to his feet, rolled roughly onto his back.

As Jake settled his hard hat onto his head, he glanced to the ground. He spied a slight movement between his feet near the remains of the extinguished cigarette.

Jake grunted and lifted his boot again.

Eric screamed as he found himself in dark shadow again as the boot slammed down with the speed of a heartbeat.

Jake repeated the motion from earlier, grinding the tiny bug beneath his boot in much the same way he had ground out the cigarette butt.

The big construction foreman returned to work without another thought to the tiny "bug" he had squished beneath his boot.
143111112212112112112121211121221.title: An Afterthought

143111112212112112112121211121222.content:
As the colossal work boot rose, Eric froze, utterly terrified. His legs simply wouldn't carry him. He stared up at Jake in stupefying awe. The mountainous construction worker's face was grim and unsympathetic, and Eric didn't know if he could see him or not.

The boot swung overhead, blocking out the sun, then it thundered towards the ground on top of the tiny professor. The impact was deafening, but miraculously Eric ended up caught in a groove in the deep tread of Jake's colossal size 16 boot. The ground heaved and dust and debris were hurled at Eric in the dark confines of the temporary cavern, and then the light came back as the enormous boot soared into the air again.

Eric was dazed, left deafened and scratched and bruised from the ordeal, but no longer frozen, and he ran as fast as he could. He ran towards the stack of bricks, and thought about crawling into the gaps between them. It wouldn't be a permanent hiding place, but it would do for the time being.

****

As Jake was turning to leave, his cell phone rang. It was one of his suppliers, calling to confirm an order of materials. Jake paced idly, kicking at loose stones as he talked.

****

A tiny lizard, a baby, barely an inch long clung to the wall of bricks, on the lookout for prey. It spotted the tiny professor scurrying towards the bricks and quickly left it's vantage point, wriggling its way across the hard dirt towards the tiny man, which would be barely a mouthful, but nourishing nonetheless.

****

Eric was nearing the safe refuge of the wall of bricks and feeling some relief when he saw a lizard, looking to him like a dragon hurl itself from the bricks and come writhing towards him. Eric stopped in his tracks and turned to run away, but the lizard grew closer and eventually snapped its mouth around him. Its tiny teeth held him tight with a painful pressure, but did not cut him. "Oh God, this is the end," Eric thought, and then the lizard began to thrash its head from side to side to dispatch its prey.

****

While talking, Jake noticed the tiny scurrying lizard on the ground. He regarded any creature small enough to fit under his massive size 16s as a bug, and fit only to be pulverized, and this lizard's fate was no different. Without any thought, his steel-toed boot slammed down on the tiny creature, mashing it into a tiny bloodied mess which stuck to the sole of his boot. The phone call ended, and Jake put his phone in his pocket and strode off, without a further thought to the lizard under his heavy tread, and completely unaware of the tiny man he had just killed as well. A few steps later, and the lizard's corpse was left on the hard dirt, its guts ruptured out of its side and its mouth, its scales shining in the hot sun. Unnoticeable in the tiny spot of mess was the miniscule professor, flattened and caught up in entrails of the lizard.
143111112212112112112121211121222.title: Underfoot

choices: Eric is in the first bite
A few bites later...
143111112212112112112121211122.content:
Near the door, Jon paused to let one of the restaurant's waitresses walk past with a tray loaded with food for other hungry diners.

At the same time, he moved one of his hands to his shirt and brushed away some crumbs from his meal.

Tiny Eric, still adhered to the cotton fabric of Jon's T-shirt, watched helplessly as the enormous hand rushed toward him. In a casual motion, the a huge finger brushed over him, flicking Eric away with other crumbs from Jon's meal.

Falling free, Eric screamed, but his plunge stopped far short of the distant floor. He landed with a squishy thump on a vast field of an oozing orange-colored substance. He smelled grease, meat, salt...

"Where am I?" Eric cried as he tried to get his bearings.

A waitress leaned over a table to deliver a tray to two co-workers.

"OK, who had the cheeseburger with everything?" She asked.

Brett smiled and raised his hand. "That would be me," he said.

"I guess the BLT's yours," she said, handing Brett's friend, Roger, the other plate.

Brett looked down at the burger. "MMM, that looks good!" Brett said. He picked up the top half of the bun and smashed it down on top of his cheeseburger, failing to notice the little speck in the center of the cheese-covered burger patty.

Not wasting any time, Brett lifted the burger, opened wide and took a huge bite.

"MMM,mmm," he said, his mouth full. "That's good."
143111112212112112112121211122.title: Mere Crumb?

1431111122121121121121212111221.content:
Eric, terrified, saw the unknown giant holding a huge, round sesame seed bun in one hand.

Motivated to move, Eric tried to trudge through the layer of squishy cheese atop Brett's massive burger patty.

He got only a few steps before Brett brought the top bun down on the delicious combination of cheese and ground-beef burger patty. The oncoming bun pushed tiny Eric into the cheese, face-down.

Brett lifted the burger to his mouth and opened wide.

In one massive bite, he consumed a large portion of the burger.

-------

The giant's teeth tore through the bun, cheese and beef patty, and then began smashing the components of the burger into a pulp.

Against all odds, Eric avoided the first of the giant's methodical chewing motions, and found himself pushed onto a wide, massive tongue with the pulverized remains of the bite of cheeseburger.

He suffered quite a shock to discover his opportunity for leaping clear of danger has been negated when the giant proved capable of an extensive bite.

Despite racing thoughts, no solution to his imminent dilemma sprang into his analytical mind.

The massive tongue began to push the food, including one unknown special ingredient, toward the back of the cavernous mouth.

Eric was pushed along, like a pebble caught in an avalanche.

He hoped to think of something, even at this late interval, when a flood of ice-cold soda flooded the giant's mouth and washed the first bite of burger (and Eric) down Brett's throat.

Burger mush, gallons and gallons of soda and one tiny scientist found themselves relocated to the pit of Brett's stomach.

The meal continued, soon burying Eric beneath tons of wheat, cheese and beef. By that point, he was no longer fighting.

Brett, no longer hungry, walked the few blocks back to his workplace, which helped digest his meal even faster.
1431111122121121121121212111221.title: Just One Bite

choices: "Nah I had that last week"
"Sure I'm always up for a good burger"
1431111122121121121121212111222.content:
Eric had struggled to rush out of danger's way only to be smashed into the soft cheese by the weight of bun and burger toppings.

He cried out in terror each time he felt the burger move upwards. Each time he was jarred as the whole sandwich shook, accompanied by the crunch and smack of another bite taken away.

Finally after much squirming and a number of bites, Eric heard the loudest, and nearest, crunch yet. He froze and gasped as a wall of white appeared right in front of him. It pulled away and Eric could see he was right in front of the giant's lips. Every now and then the giant's lips would part and he would see the bite being tossed about and chewed to a pulp.

Suddenly the giant's jaw stopped its rhythmic movement. The lips tightened and Eric heard a gulp as the giant sent his food on its way. Eric cried out for help, expecting the burger to move forward. Instead a massive fry, as wide as an airplane's cabin, appeared from beneath his horizon. The ketchup dipped strip hovered near the mouth for a moment.

The lips parted and the tongue extended forward, as if nervous the food might escape. Eric could see chewed bits of bread, burger, and lettuce clinging to the tongue's surface. The fry was shoved forward and the entire length of it was forced inside the mouth, disappearing behind the lips effortlessly. Again Eric witnessed something so large be obliterated easily. He nearly peed his pants.

-----

Brett chewed thoughtfully on the fry. He swallowed and looked at Roger.

"You have to try this burger," he said. "It's incredible!"

Roger looked up from his BLT and said...
1431111122121121121121212111222.title: A few bites later...

14311111221211211211212121112221.content:
Brett shrugged. "Okay, your loss Roger."

-----

Eric from his vantage point struggles to think of a solution. Currently his possibilities were to be eaten by one giant or the other. Neither were good, and he had no control over the outcome anyways.

He cries out as the giant holding the burger raises him back up to his mouth. Obviously a decision has been made!

The mouth gapes open. Soggy bits of bread and burger mingle with piles of pale potato mush all over the tongue. The teeth glint in the light, contrasting well with the dark behind them. This only makes their sharp edges more obvious to Eric.

"Noooooo!" he wails as he moves towards this horrible scene. But the giant above, whom he does not even known, pays no heed to his meal. He doesn't notice the screams of this tiny extra topping. Nor does he think to check for a tiny person in his sandwich.

As Eric passes through the lips he is hit with a wall of stench and humidity, truly bringing home that he is inside a human mouth, about to be eaten. A wordless scream erupts from him, but it's too late as the teeth come together and Eric, along with the bite of burger are sealed from the outside world.

The giant chews quickly. Eric is unable to do anything but scream as he is flung about, relying on dub luck to remain intact. He feels himself hit sharp edges, but always bounces away to have more food rained onto him and continuously be tortured.

Finally everything stops. Before Eric can even move, the mushy pile of food is pushed to the back of the mouth. Eric barely discerns the uvula above as he passes it. He gasps to start screaming, but it gets caught in his throat as he violently entered Brett's.

-----

Brett swallows his burger. He is starting to feel full and will probably need a box. “That’s good,” he thinks “this will make a fantastic lunch tomorrow.” He then focuses on Roger’s story about a stray dog as he absently eats his fries.

-----

Eric lands in the stomach after a rough ride down the esophagus. He is shocked. He is terrified. He is going to die.

The last statement repeats through his mind. He will die at the hands (or more literally the stomach) of some random man enjoying a meaningless lunch. The thought angers the tiny professor. How could someone of his stature, of his intelligence meet such an insignificant and unnoticed end?

“How could you not notice me!? You ate a person, you complete oblivious idiot!!” Eric yelled in frustration. “You’re going to kill me!!” he screams as tears spring to his eyes.

So wrapped is Eric in his raging emotions, he doesn’t notice the sounds of the giant around him chewing the fries. The sound of the gulp enters his subconscious and he stops yelling. He feels a sense of dread but is unsure why. Suddenly with a squelch he hears some fries from above entering the stomach. But the stomach had shifted and he watches the pile fall from above to rest nearby. He is stunned into silence, there is nothing more he can do but wait.

Eric felt defeated, it was his own fault. His determination and arrogance to beat science was the reason for being here. Some things weren’t meant to be messed with. With that he leaned back and did his best to be comfortable for his last moments.

-----

Brett finished eating his fries, boxed up his burger, and after saying good bye to Roger walked back to work. He didn’t know that the motion of his walk buried Eric in his chewed food. He didn’t think about the piles of soggy burger and fries sitting inside awaiting the acids. The feeling of fullness gave him the energy he needed to finish an important presentation he would give tomorrow. He paid no mind to the gurgles emitting from his gut as his stomach churned and broke his food down. As Brett drove home, he dreamed of a possible promotion if the presentation went well, oblivious that his lunch had almost all moved into his intestines to be further digested.

When he thought about the lunch he had had, he didn’t think of the burger. No, he thought about the conversation with Roger, or the friendly and cute waitress who usually served him there. Nothing terribly special about that afternoon. Or so he thought. No, Brett would remain unaware of what he had done by merely eating his lunch that day. His life went on like it always had, because for him, nothing had changed. But unfortunately for Eric, there was nothing left to change.
14311111221211211211212121112221.title: Roger's loss, Eric's too

choices: Roger's shirt
Roger's BLT
14311111221211211211212121112222.content:
Brett nods and hands the burger to Roger.

Roger, holding the delicious sandwich in his hands looks at it for a moment. His eyes are sizing it up and he is unconsciously deciding how big to part his jaws for this bite.

Again unconsciously he decides this burger is large and will need a big bite.

He squeezes the burger tightly and brings it to his mouth for the kill.

-----

Eric manages to free one arm and begins to wave at the new giant. "Help me!" he screams desperately. But the giant pays no heed to the unnoticed speck of a scientist. Instead he moves the burger towards his opening mouth. But as he does so he squeezes the sandwich tightly, sending a glob of ketchup smack into Eric. It pulls him free and Eric and sauce go plummeting onto...
14311111221211211211212121112222.title: When will the terror of lunch end?

choices: Eric gets the ketchup rolling
Roger decides to continue with his own sandwich
143111112212112112112121211122222.content:
Eric grunts as he lands on a surface. He hears the crunch of the burger above him and laughs joyfully to find the giant helped him to escape.

As the giant says "yum" in approval, Eric realizes where he is.

He's on another sandwich.

"Are you kidding me?!" he screams in frustration. From the pie, to the burger, to this.... it was getting ridiculous!

The ketchup that cushioned his fall now holds him fairly tightly in place. From the giant's perspective it's undoubtedly a dismissible amount, which leaves Eric still in danger of being eaten. This is a possibility that he still doesn't like. No matter how much it nearly happens, he simply will not warm up to it.

He begins to squirm in hopes of either breaking free or getting the ketchup to drip off the sandwich and take him too. Anything to be off of someone's food!
143111112212112112112121211122222.title: Becoming a routine

choices: Roger's Shirt
Roger's Lap
1431111122121121121121212111222221.content:
The tiny research scientist finally, through his frantic efforts, dislodged the puddle of ketchup, which leaked over the edge of the bun. The tiny man found himself pulled along by the slow flow of the tomato condiment.

"Yes, just a little more," he yelled, hopeful at putting some distance between himself and Roger's hungry mouth.

Suddenly, the drop of ketchup, with its tiny passenger, fell free of the bun and landed with a splat on...
1431111122121121121121212111222221.title: Eric gets the ketchup rolling

choices: Eric makes it safely to the new hiding place
Eric gets seen
14311111221211211211212121112222211.content:
"Oh, man!" exclaimed Roger, realising he had just dripped sauce down his shirt. Grabbing a serviette he roughly wiped the sauce up, tossing the serviette on the table while he continued to eat his meal.

- - - - -

Eric's scream of joy at escaping the burger and a certain death inside the giant turned to a scream of shock as a wall of white tissue paper approached him. He was unceremoniously wiped off the shirt and got caught inside the serviette. For a moment he thought he might have jumped from the fire into the pan and his head was filled with visions of the giant crushing the paper towel in his hand or just tossing it in the garbage, neither fate being something that Eric thought he would survive.
Instead he was jostled as the serviette was dumped on the table.
Wasting no time, he untangled himself and dropped onto the table, using the serviette as cover while he looked for somewhere safer to hide.
Not too far from him was a collection of salf and pepper shakers, the serviette holder and a bowl of sugar satchels. If he could make it to there he could hide between them while he decided his next move. But to get there he would need to dash across thirty feet of open table, totally exposed.
14311111221211211211212121112222211.title: Roger's Shirt

1431111122121121121121212111222222.content:
Roger's massive hands drop to the sides of the sandwich. Eric cries out in terror "NO! WAIT!" Naturally his words have no effect.

He screams as Roger's long fingers grasp the sides of the island of a sandwich. He is forced into the bread by strong G-Forces as Roger lifts the food to his face.

The giant man doesn't even notice the bit of ketchup that had landed on his sandwich.

Eric looks up and groans in fear as the mouth ahead of him stretches open. 'After all this fighting, I'm still being eaten' is the only thought that crosses his mind. Ahead he can see the white teeth towering overhead and beyond them the pink tongue illuminated by the outside light. This only serves to make the bits of bread, lettuce, and beef spread across the tongue from the burger more apparent. "NOOOOO!!!" Eric cries out from instinctual fear.

As the part of the sandwich he is riding enters the mouth, the light begins to fade quickly as Roger takes his next bite.

"I am a brilliant scientist!!" he wails in frustration when the light completely fades. "Why is this happening?!"

Before he can get any answer Roger starts to chew, throwing Eric's world into chaos. He screams as he is tossed about, no different from the hundreds and thousands of other crumbs trapped with him inside the giant's mouth. Though he bounces of molars a couple of times Eric is lucky enough to still be in one piece as Roger stops chewing.

Without a moment of hesitation, in one swift movement Roger moves the clump of chewed food into his throat and easily swallows it. As Eric descends the esophagus with the food his mind simply cannot process what is happening. He simply stares and does nothing as he stares off reflecting on his life and loved ones.

When the food lands with a splat atop the chewed remains of what Roger had already swallowed, Eric suddenly focuses on the situation he is in. He starts screaming and runs off hoping to find a stomach wall to beat on. He needed to find a way out, there was no way he would end his life in here.

---

Although he had enjoyed the burger, Roger decided he preferred his sandwich. He looked down and picked up the last piece. He was only halfway conscious of the food as he chewed and swallowed it. He put his hand over his extended stomach that now contained his entire sandwich and fries (as well as an unnoticed passenger). He enjoyed these lunches with his friend, whom he rarely saw otherwise due to their conflicting schedules. He said goodbye to Brett and got into his car to return to work. He vaguely wondered about the tickle he had felt in his stomach halfway through lunch that had stopped suddenly after he had swallowed another bite.

"Well it stopped, so it's obviously no big deal" he said out-loud to himself. His stomach gurgled loudly. Roger smiled "You agree!" he laughed patting his comfortably full stomach.

He was happy, and very satisfied with his life at that moment. It was a good thing he was unaware of the unconscious man trapped in a pile of chewed turkey and lettuce in his stomach. Such a realization would have horrified and disgusted Roger. But he had no way of knowing, no way to even suspect such a horrible thing had happened. He was pretty lucky that he was so ignorant of the goings on in his gut, because otherwise he wouldn't be smiling.
1431111122121121121121212111222222.title: Ignorant Bliss

choices: HIs uniform (Mask, Clothes etc.)
His body (Dick/Balls, Chest etc.)
14311111221211211211212122.content:
The gigantic masked exterminator examined the roach trap one last time before semi-crushing it with his gloved hand to conseve space. He opened up his bag of supplies and without a care in the world chucked the crushed roach trap into his bag before closing it and proceeding to crush the remaining roach traps under his gigantic boot.

Eric shuddered again as he was forced to stare at his captor's stoic, covered, tinted mask and he could faintly make out one of the eye's examining him. It almost looked hungry! What did exterminator's usually do with captured bugs? He screamed as suddenly the walls surronding him imploded into itself. He was forced to lie vertical as the stick liquid which covered the walls was forced vertical. He heard rustiling but this sounded far away until he felt himself flying only to smack back into the liquid.

The exterminator continued with his job. He still had many bugs to crush underneath his gigantic boots, being an exterminator didn't really pay well, but he enjoyed the high he got from torturing bugs before ending their life with a step of his foot. However after a relativly boring day of work, he headed home to change and go out. He grabbed his bag and giving it a jostle just to make sure his stuff was still there he headed to his van.

The liquid Eric was stuck to wasn't made to defy gravity, so slowly Eric found himself oozing out of the trap! Eric had no control over where he went and he ended up dripping onto a black surface, he had no idea what it was. As soon as he hit the surface he tried to struggle out of the liquid but found himself just getting sucked in like quicksand! Eric stop struggling and prepared to wait it out when suddenly the black surface lit up and a horrible loud noise began playing!

Eric covered his ears at the deafing noise played, and sceamed when the bag he was thrown in opened up revealing the masked face peering in at him. Suddenly a massive, strong gloved hand flew into the short space, and Eric felt his life get shorter as it rummaged around, almost throwing things into the air! Finally it reached the phone and an inch away from Eric's head a massive gloved wall of flesh crushed anything between it! However his luck finally ran out and the hand reached around and Eric saw a shadow as a massive hand wrapped around Eric...

"This is the end..." Thought Eric.

However the hand wrapped around his body but left his head exposed! The viscous goo had formed a sort of pressure cushion for Eric which stopped his body being quickly crushed, however he still felt intense pressure on his body and had to take shallow breaths. He felt himself rise hundreds of kilometers in the air and saw the imposing figure of the exterminator approach. Now that he wasn't in sudden danger he began taking in the deafing noise playing. It sounded like a ringtone?

Suddenly he was pressed against the tinted mask. He could still barely see anything, and it was quite intimidating having no idea what your captor looks like, however the hand backed away from the mask and the other flipped the visor up! Eric got a brief glimpse of the exterminator and he wasn't bad looking, not great and mostly average. Thick messy hair, a partially kept goatee and he had an almost natural sneer?

Suddenly he was forced moving into the exterminator's face and felt himself pressed against the rough goatee of the exterminator. Slobbers of spit struck Eric and he felt the dirty unkeep beard hair's scratch him. Thankfully he stayed stuck to the phone screen and watched the exterminator desperate to catch his attention. With a click the call ended and Eric thought he would be returned to the bag, however an eye suddenly was looking at him! Eric gasped in joy but was quickly shocked as a gloved hand wiped him off! He was stuck to the gloved hand! Wherever the exterminator touched next he would be deposited to!

The exterminator fumbled around for his phone, finally spotting it he grabbed it and answered it was his mate James! He wanted a drink at the pub and he happily accepted. Ending the call he noticed how dirty the screen of his phone was! He gave it a quick wipe and finally pulled into his home. Getting an itch he scratched...
14311111221211211211212122.title: The giant exterminator puts the roach trap in h...

choices: wiggle around and maybe Josh will notice me!
decide to relax and enjoy the ride for a while!
14311111221211211212.content:
"JOSH! DOWN HERE!! STOP!"

but the screams are futile, as Eric, along with the mounds of fabric entangling him shoot up directly towards Josh's crotch. The giant adjusts himself slightly, and Eric ends up wedged in between Josh's still moist cock and balls. Eric looks out to the side and witnesses the remainder of light in the light fabric boxers be enveloped by total darkness, followed by a distinct and very loud "ZIP" sound.
14311111221211211212.title: wedged

choices: No one accepts the invite
James walks out of the room with Kevin
14311111221211212.content:
Hearing the commotion outside in the motel room, teeny Eric panicked and dove back into the huge boxer shorts.

The drawer opened. Kevin peered into the drawer and didn’t see any sign of the bug.

“Damn pest! Probably hiding.”

He grabbed up some of his socks and pawed at the boxers.

As he was held aloft, Eric felt himself slipping along the fabric of the boxers. He tried to find something he could grab to secure himself.

Unfortunately, he tumbled out of the boxers and fell to the bottom of the drawer.

On his back, Eric looked up and saw an evil smile on Kevin’s face as the giant looked down at him. “Gotcha! I knew you wouldn’t be able to get away from me.”

Eric screamed in terror as Kevin’s hand reached into the drawer for him.

Kevin’s enormous fingers enclosed him in a prison of flesh.

“At least take that damn bug outside before you stomp it!” James told Kevin.

“Why? It’s not like this carpet isn’t already filthy.”

Kevin produced an exaggerated sigh. “Oh, very well.”

With tiny Eric enclosed in his fist, Kevin managed to slip on some sandals.

“Anyone wanna watch?” Kevin invited.
14311111221211212.title: Back at Kevin's Mercy

choices: A man arrives to repair the cracks in the sidewalk
A 17-year-old surfer walks into view
143111112212112121.content:
None of his buddies shared Kevin's
enthusiasm for extermination.

"Fine!" Kevin grumbled. "I'll be right back."

He stepped out of the motel room, enjoying
the feeble struggles of the tiny bug enclosed
in his fist.

Enclosed in the massive prison of Kevin's fist,
Eric fought to remain calm. He knew that Kevin
posed a deadly threat.

Suddenly, light flooded in, almost blinding the
poor little scientist.

And then he felt himself dropped roughly onto
an expanse of concrete.

Eric, trying to shield his eyes from the bright
light, saw that Kevin had dropped him onto an
old, cracked sidewalk bordered by the
overgrown weedy expanse that passed for the
motel's landscaping.

Then he saw Kevin.

The colossal giant loomed over him. Eric
watched as the giant raised one sandal-clad
foot.

"No!" Eric cried, and he started running.

Ahead of him, he saw an imposing crevice in
the concrete sidewalk.

Kevin toyed with the bug, slamming his
sandal down a few inches ahead of the
creature's path.

He laughed as the bug turned aside— until he
saw the tiny creature's destination. He hadn't
noticed until that moment the large crack in
the sidewalk.

"Oh no you don't!" Kevin shouted.

Eric dived into the shadowy interior of the
sidewalk crack. He hit hard as he tumbled into
the crevice, but scrambled to his feet to duck
under an overhanging ledge of concrete.

"Damn!" Kevin said angrily. He got down on
hands and knees and looked in the crevice,
searching for his bug.

His buddies found him in that position when
they came out of the motel.

"Uh, looking for something?" Zac asked.

Kevin, a frown on his face, stood. "Oh, that
damn bug got away."

Josh and James hooted with laughter.

"The great Kevin— foiled by a mere bug!" Zac
quipped. "Well, big guy, we're going back to
the beach. Wanna come with us or do you
want to keep wasting this trip chasing bugs?"

"Smartass!" Kevin snapped, but he fell in line
with his friends and followed them toward the
beach.

Meantime, Eric, finally convinced by the relative
silence, crawled from beneath the ledge of
concrete and peered up out of the crevice. The
terrifying giant had gone.

But, before he could climb out of the concrete
chasm...
143111112212112121.title: Into the Gap

choices: Too exhausted to continue his struggle, the cement begins to harden around Eric.
With the last of his strength, Eric pulls himself out of the cement and collapse
1431111122121121211.content:
Eric saw a pair of dirty wookboots heading his way. He lowered himself back down into the crack, as the footfalls got closer and louder.

The boots came to rest just above him. He looked up to see a guy who looked in his late twenties, holding a bucket in his hand and muttering something to himself. The bucket dropped to the sidewalk, and the tremor that it caused knocked Eric off his feet.

He got back to his feet, and noticed that the guy above him began mixing something in the bucket. He couldn't make out just what it was. As he continued watching the guy, he noticed some greyish stains on his workboots. Then it dawned on him. This guy was mixing cement to fill the crack that he was hiding in!

He became terrified. The last thing that he wanted was to be cemented forever into this crack. He began frantically trying to figure a way out of there without being noticed by this guy.

His actions were just a little too slow, because in that instant he looked up to see the bucket above him and it was slowly being poured on top of him.

The liquid cement rushed into the crack. It took Eric like a wave in the ocean and carried him to the corner of the crack he was in. He thrashed around as he became covered in the cement. In his current situation, he didn't notice that above him, a small trowel began smoothing over the hardening cement.

As Eric tried to keep his head above the cement, the trowel passed over him pushing him beneath the liquid. Satisfied with the job he finished, the worker picked up his things and walked on to the next crack.

Eric was finally able to get a footing and he pushed himself up above the setting cement. He had just enough time to see the worker walking off, leaving him behind in his possible grave. He screamed but it was no use.
1431111122121121211.title: Set in Stone

choices: Head for home with the dad and sons
The dad drops his sons off at an all-male school
143111112212112122.content:
"I've got nothing better to do," James said,
moving to follow Kevin out the door of the
motel.

"Don't fool around too long, guys," Zac said as
his two friends headed outdoors.

From within the enclosed fist, Eric's world was
one of a cramped, hot, damp prison. What did
the giant mean to do with him?

Suddenly, light flooded in, blinding Eric. As his
vision began to return, he felt himself dropped.
He landed heavily on a stretch of gritty asphalt.
In front of him was a concrete cliff nearly 40
feet tall! It was the curb that separated the
motel parking lot from the sidewalk along the
front of all the motel rooms.

Then, looking higher, he saw the enormous
feet of his brother's two giant friends, James
and Kevin. The two giants, standing on the
sidewalk, stared down at him.

"Just let it roam free," James joked, prodding
Kevin. "I'm sure it will never again enter a
motel room where you're staying."

"I'll make sure of that!" Kevin said. He raised
one of his sandal-clad feet.

"No!" Eric cried. He tensed, trying to decide on
a direction for an escape attempt, when
Kevin's stomp was interrupted.

Suddenly, from the neighboring motel room, a
father and his two sons emerged. They
walked past Kevin and James.

One of the sons, a teen about 17 years old,
bumped into Kevin.

"Sorry," the kid apologized when he saw the
angry look on Kevin's face.

The father and sons deposited some luggage
next to the curb. "I'll get the car," said the
father, who looked about 40 years old.

"Dan, there's more luggage," said a
15-year-old youth with dark hair.

In the commotion, Eric concentrated on hiding
from James. The huge bags suddenly
deposited on the pavement offered a refuge.
He ran toward them.

Kevin scanned the parking lot. "They caused
the bug to get away!" Kevin grumbled.

"So?" James asked. "Why do you have such a
hang-up on bugs?"

"I hate them!" Kevin declared.

The father backed the car toward the curb. The
loud roar of the engine panicked Eric. He ran
berserkly toward a huge bag filled with a
week's worth of dirty laundry that the father and
sons had filled during their family excursion.

"Load up," the father ordered.

Suddenly, 17-year-old Daniel grabbed the dirty
laundry bag, hoisting it upright. A pair of his
boxers had fallen onto the pavement. He
grabbed them and dropped them into the bag.
He shoved the bag into the already crowded
back seat. He looked at his younger brother. "I
guess Frank gets to ride with the dirty clothes,"
Dan teased.

Their father looked around. "Have we got
everything?"

"Yes," Dan answered.

Within the bag, Eric had tumbled onto a wide
pair of jockey shorts just before the giant youth
had dropped a pair of boxers on top of him.

He was screaming in panic upon realizing that
he was about to be whisked away from his
brother by a giant family of strangers.

"No! Zac! Someone! Help me!" Eric screamed.
143111112212112122.title: New Trip, New Characters

choices: Frank needs something out of the laundry bag.
The family arrives at home.
1431111122121121221.content:
Eric was in a panic. The trip to the motel and the room itself had been horrible. With Zac's friends around, he had been in danger of getting squished at any moment, but at least he had the hope of getting to Zac and getting him to recognize that the 'little bug' was really his brother.

Now, he was riding home with some strange family that not only didn't know him, they didn't even know that he was here!

Here he was lying on top of a week's worth of dirty t-shirts and underwear, damp bathing suits and beach towels.

He heard the family talking amongst each other, there was a father and the older brother, Dan was in the front seat. It was Frank, the younger brother who was closest to Eric. So close, in fact that every time the boy spoke, Eric had to cover his ears. The dirty laundry bag had been thrown in last and so was on top of the rest of the luggage, right next to Frank's head. This whole experience was getting worse and worse.

Eric was trying to think of what to do when the family got home. From the smells around him, he didn't think that there were any clean clothes in this bag at all. Would the bag just get dumped right into the wash, would Eric even have a chance to escape from it? All kinds of horrible scenarios started to crop up in Eric's imagination.

Just then...
1431111122121121221.title: Riding Home

Eric nearly gagged as he took a deep breath, trying to restore his nerve as he spied unseen on the young titan. The wide, flat tiles in the laundry room felt cool beneath the tiny man's bare feet.

Something about the fact that Frank was only an untried youth only made the horror of Eric's situation even more blatant. He was trapped, alone, in a world filled with giant after giant, any of them capable of erasing his reality with any meager, unaware action.

Staring up at the huge teen, Eric made one decision. He had no wish to risk destruction by approaching the titan.

When Frank saw there was nothing here he could use against his older sibling, he decided to turn and leave.

On the floor, if the boy had looked down with his sharp eyes, he might have seen a pale speck in the gloom in the shadow of the laundry bag.

He didn't look down, and instead he stomped from the laundry room, his massive sneakers shaking even the solid tile flooring beneath tiny Eric's footing.

Eric knew he had missed a chance to seek assistance, but at the last second decided he wasn't quite ready to turn his fate over to a middle school kid.

He could still try to contact the kid's father or perhaps the older, possibly more mature and reasonable, brother.

The looming hallway offered very little. The hardwood floors beneath his teeny bare feet made travel less of a challenge. Tiny Eric remembered the challenge back at the dirty hotel room of trying to push his way through a forest of fibers on the dingy carpeted floor.

As much of a nightmare the experience had been trapped in a motel room with his younger brother and his massive friends, all of them utterly oblivious to their tiny stowaway, Eric almost wished he was back there.

At least, he had still stood a chance, however slight, of making contact with his brother who, with the lift of a finger, could have been his salvation.

He knew almost nothing about this family of strangers other than there was a father, perhaps a few years older than Eric, and his two sons, aged 17 and 15.

Eric decided his best and perhaps only real chance of getting out of this mess was to make contact with the father. "He's an adult," Eric said aloud. "He should be trustworthy."

Even from his insignificant location on the floor, Eric saw that there were four doors arranged along the hallway. Two doors were located on the left, and another couple of doors were situated on the right.

What lay behind the doors, however, he didn't have a clue. He guessed that one of the rooms might belong to the father, but which one?

He had won a reprieve and, now as he stared up at the giant, he recognized the father of the two teenagers. The huge man reached for the door knob. As Eric watched from the floor, the giant man entered the second room on the left.

Eric, more cautious now, kept close to the baseboard running the length of the hall. He had no desire to be caught in the open should another giant member of the household make an appearance.

When he reached the door to the father's room, he scampered under the door and entered a colossal master bedroom.

.....

He liked spending quality time with his boys, but the weekend in the beach had left him no privacy. Back home and in the sanctuary of his own room, the man stripped off his clothes and grabbed a magazine as he settled onto his bed.

He was already stroking like mad by the time teeny Eric reached the door and slipped under it.

Eric looked around the room. He saw a massive bed, but didn't see the giant. "Where did he go?"

Then, he heard titanic moans that left him petrified.

On the bed, the huge man reached with a free hand to turn a page in the skin mag, but instead caused the publication to slip off the side of the bed.

An unprepared Eric saw the huge magazine crash to the floor next to the bed. He felt a blast of displaced air rush past him after the magazine impacted the floor.

He realized the man must be on the bed. Eric scurried forward, toward the magazine. As he got closer, he recognized the giant color photographs on the glossy pages...
